The Book of Isaiah

1 ¬appearance °which ¬saw ¬Isaiah ⁼son of·¬Amos °which ¬saw ¬according·to of·the ⁼Yudaea and ¬according·to of·Yerushalam in to·kingdom of·¬Uzziah and of·¬Jotham and of·¬Ahaz and of·¬Hezekiah which⁺ they·became·king of·the ⁼Yudaea

2 ꜝhear heaven and ꜝ¬listen·to·yourself earth ¬that lord spoke °sons⁺ I·engendered and I·¬lifted·up they then °me they·¬rejected

3 knew ¬ox °the ⁼self-¬possessing and donkey °the ⁼¬manger of·the ⁼lord of·him Yisra’el then °me not knew and the ⁼people °me not ¬understanded

4 ¬woe! nation ⁼¬sinful people ⁼¬full of·sins⁺ seed ⁼¬evil sons⁺ ⁼¬lawless⁺ you⁺·¬left·behind °the ⁼lord and you⁺·¬angered °the ⁼holy of·the ⁼Yisra’el

5 °what ¬still you⁺·should·be·¬struck ¬adding °¬lawlessness all ⁼head to °¬travail and all ⁼heart to °¬grief

6 off of·feet⁺ ¬until of·head not·also trauma not·also ¬wound not·also ¬plague ⁼¬·inflamed not is °¬dressing to·¬put not·also °¬olive·oil not·also °¬bandages⁺

7 the ⁼earth of·you⁺ ¬deserted the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·you⁺ ¬scorcheds⁺ °the ⁼¬country of·you⁺ ¬before of·you⁺ ¬another's⁺ they·¬devour °her and ¬layed·waste·himself having·self-¬overturned ¬by of·peoples⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺

8 will·be·¬left·behind the ⁼daughter of·¬Zion as ¬tent in to·vineyard and as ¬storehouse·of·fruits in to·¬cucumber·garden as city ⁼self-¬assaulting

9 and if ńot lord of·tzeba’ot ¬left·behind to·us °seed as °¬Sodom iᵮ we·were·been·generated and as °¬Gomorrah iᵮ we·were·¬likened

10 ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord ¬rulers⁺ of·¬Sodom ꜝ¬watch·out⁺ °law of·God people of·¬Gomorrah

11 °what to·me ¬multitude of·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·you⁺ says lord ¬full I·am of·¬burnt·offerings⁺ of·¬rams⁺ and °¬fat of·lambs⁺ and °blood of·¬bulls⁺ and of·¬he-goats⁺ not I·¬plan·myself

12 not·then ifᵮ you⁺·should·come·yourselves⁺ to·be·¬seen to·me what for ¬sought·out °these⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you⁺ to·¬trample °the ⁼¬palace of·me

13 not you⁺·will·¬add·yourselves⁺ ifᵮ you⁺·should·¬bear °¬fine·flour °¬futile ⁼¬incense ¬abomination to·me is °the⁺ ⁼young·moons⁺ of·you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ and °day ⁼great not I·¬endure·myself °fasting and °¬idleness

14 and °the⁺ ⁼young·moons⁺ of·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬festivals⁺ of·you⁺ ¬hates the ⁼soul of·me you⁺·were·been·generated to·me to °¬gratification ¬not·any·more I·will·¬loosen °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you⁺

15 ¬when °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ you⁺·should·¬stretch·out unto °me I·will·¬turn·away °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·me off of·you⁺ and ifᵮ you⁺·should·¬multiply °the ⁼¬petition not I·will·¬listen·to·myself of·you⁺ the·ones⁺ for hands⁺ of·you⁺ of·blood ¬full⁺

16 ꜝ¬wash⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬clean⁺ ꜝbe·generated⁺·yourselves⁺ ꜝ¬remove⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·you⁺ ¬opposite of·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·me ꜝ¬cease⁺·yourselves⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ of·you⁺

17 ꜝstudy⁺ °beautiful to·do ꜝ¬seek·out⁺ °judgment ꜝbe·¬rescued⁺ °self-¬harming ꜝjudge⁺ to·orphan and ꜝjustify⁺ °widow

18 and ¬come and we·should·¬plead says lord and ifᵮ they·should·be the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you⁺ as ¬crimson as °¬snow I·will·whiten ifᵮ then they·should·be as °¬scarlet as °¬wool I·will·whiten

19 and ifᵮ you⁺·should·¬will and you⁺·should·¬listen·to of·me °the⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·the ⁼earth you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺

20 ifᵮ then ńot you⁺·should·¬will ńot·then you⁺·should·¬listen·to of·me ¬sword °you⁺ will·¬devour·himself °the·one for mouth of·lord spoke °these⁺

21 ¬how?! was·generated·himself fornicator ⁼city ⁼¬faithful ⁼¬Zion ¬full of·judgment in to·which justice was·¬slept in to·her now then ¬man-killers⁺

22 °the·one silver of·you⁺ ¬failing the⁺ ⁼¬peddlers⁺ of·you they·¬mingle °the ⁼wine to·water

23 the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·you they·¬disobey ¬participants⁺ of·thieves⁺ loving °¬gifts⁺ ¬pursuing °¬repayment to·orphan⁺ not judging and °judgment of·widows⁺ not ¬watching·out

24 through °this °¬these⁺ says the ⁼master ⁼lord of·tzeba’ot ¬woe! the⁺ ⁼¬·strong of·Yisra’el not will·¬cease·himself for of·me the ⁼¬wrath in to·the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺ and °judgment out of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·me I·will·do

25 and I·will·¬bring·upon °the ⁼hand of·me upon °you and I·will·¬burn °you to °¬clean then °the⁺ ⁼¬disobeying I·should·¬destroy and I·will·¬remove °all⁺ ⁼¬lawless⁺ off of·you and °all⁺ ⁼¬arrogant⁺ I·will·¬humble

26 and I·will·¬approach °the⁺ ⁼judges⁺ of·you as °the·one ¬before and °the⁺ ⁼¬counselors⁺ of·you as °the·one off of·¬beginning and with °these⁺ you·will·be·called city of·justice ¬capital ⁼¬faithful °¬Zion

27 with for of·judgment will·be·¬saved the ⁼¬captivity of·her and with of·¬charity

28 and they·will·be·¬broken the⁺ ⁼¬lawless⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬sinful⁺ ¬together and the⁺ ⁼¬leaving·behind °the ⁼lord they·will·be·¬completed

29 ¬because they·will·be·¬been·ashamed upon to·the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·them °which⁺ they they·¬planed·themselves and they·were·¬been·ashamed·of upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬gardens⁺ of·them °which⁺ they·¬longed·for

30 they·will·be·themselves for as ¬terebinth·resin ⁼having·¬thrown·away °the⁺ ⁼¬leafs⁺ and as ¬paradise water ńot having

31 and will·be·himself the ⁼¬strength of·them as ¬straw of·¬hemp and the⁺ ⁼¬works⁺ of·them as °¬sparks⁺ of·fire and they·will·be·¬burned the⁺ ⁼¬lawless⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬sinful⁺ ¬together and not will·be·himself the ⁼¬extinguishing

2 ⁼the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated ¬from of·lord unto °¬Isaiah ⁼son of·¬Amos about of·the ⁼Yudaea and about °Yerushalam

2 ¬that will·be·himself in to·the⁺ ⁼¬last⁺ ⁼days⁺ °¬revealed ⁼the ⁼mountain of·lord and the ⁼house of·the ⁼God upon of·¬end⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·mountains⁺ and will·be·¬lifted·up ¬above of·the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ and they·will·¬come upon °it °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

3 and they·will·¬travel·themselves nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ and they·will·¬say ¬come and we·should·¬ascend to °the ⁼mountain of·lord and to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼God ⁼Ya‘aqob and will·¬announce to·us °the ⁼¬road of·him and we·will·¬travel·ourselves in to·her out for of·¬Zion will·come·out·himself law and saying of·lord out of·Yerushalam

4 and will·judge ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and will·¬rebuke °people ⁼much and they·will·¬cut·down °the⁺ ⁼¬swords⁺ of·them to °¬plows⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬pikes⁺ of·them to °¬sickles⁺ and not will·take·himself ¬still nation upon °nation °¬sword and not ńot they·should·study ¬still to·war

5 and now the ⁼house of·the ⁼Ya‘aqob ¬come we·should·be·¬travelled to·the ⁼light of·lord

6 ¬loosened for °the ⁼people of·him °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el ¬that was·¬filled·up as the·one off of·¬beginning the ⁼¬country of·them of·¬prognosticatings⁺ as the·one of·the⁺ ⁼¬foreign⁺ and °¬children⁺ ⁼many⁺ ⁼¬foreign⁺ was·been·generated to·them

7 was·¬filled·up for the ⁼¬country of·them of·silver and of·gold and not was ¬number of·the⁺ ⁼treasures⁺ of·them and was·¬filled·up the ⁼earth of·horses⁺ and not was ¬number of·the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·them

8 and was·¬filled·up the ⁼earth of·¬abominations⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them and they·¬worshipped to·which⁺ they·did the⁺ ⁼fingers⁺ of·them

9 and ¬stooped human and was·¬humbled man and not ńot I·will·¬loosen °them

10 and now ꜝcome·to⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼rocks⁺ and ꜝ¬hide⁺·yourselves⁺ to °the ⁼earth off of·¬face of·the ⁼¬fear ⁼lord and off of·the ⁼¬glory ⁼the ⁼¬strength of·him ¬when should·¬arise to·¬crush °the ⁼earth

11 the·ones⁺ for ¬eyes⁺ of·lord ¬high⁺ then the ⁼human ⁼¬lowly and will·be·¬humbled the ⁼¬height of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and will·be·¬lifted·up lord ⁼¬alone in to·the ⁼day ⁼that

18 and °the⁺ ⁼¬hand-made⁺ ⁼all⁺ they·will·¬hide

6 ¬that will·¬catch·himself human of·the ⁼brother of·him or of·the ⁼¬of·one's·household ⁼the ⁼father of·him saying °cloak you·have ¬founder of·us ꜝbe·generated·yourself and °the ⁼¬food ⁼the·one myˊ ¬by °you ꜝlet·be

8 ¬that has·¬killed·himself Yerushalam and the ⁼Yudaea ¬??? and the⁺ ⁼tongues⁺ of·them with of·¬lawlessness °the·ones⁺ unto °lord ¬disobeying ¬because now was·¬humbled the ⁼¬glory of·them

10 telling we·should·¬bind °the ⁼just ¬that ¬inconvenient to·us is ¬then °the⁺ ⁼¬offsprings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·them they·will·¬eat·themselves

11 ¬woe! to·the ⁼¬lawless ¬evil⁺ ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him will·¬happen·himself to·him

12 people of·me the⁺ ⁼¬bailiffs⁺ of·you⁺ they·¬glean·themselves °you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬demanding they·are·lord of·you⁺ people of·me the⁺ ⁼blessing °you⁺ they·¬lead·astray °you⁺ and °the ⁼¬path of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·you⁺ they·¬trouble

13 but now will·¬appoint·himself to °judgment lord and will·stand to °judgment °the ⁼people of·him

14 he ⁼lord to °judgment will·¬come with of·the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ of·the ⁼people and with of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·him you⁺ then °what you⁺·¬burned °the ⁼vineyard of·me and the ⁼¬plunder of·the ⁼¬poor in to·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you⁺

26 and they·will·be·¬humbled and they·will·¬mourn the⁺ ⁼¬sheaths⁺ of·the ⁼cosmos of·you⁺ and you·will·be·¬left·behind ¬alone and to °the ⁼earth you·will·be·¬razed

4 and they·will·¬catch·themselves seven women⁺ of·human ⁼one saying °the ⁼bread of·us we·will·¬eat·ourselves and °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·us we·will·¬clothe·ourselves ¬but °the ⁼name ⁼the·one your ꜝlet·have·called·himself upon °us ꜝ¬remove °the ⁼¬reproach of·us

2 then to·the ⁼day ⁼that will·¬shine·forth the ⁼God in to·¬plan with of·¬glory upon of·the ⁼earth of·the·one to·¬lift·up and to·¬glorify °the·one ¬leaving·behind of·the ⁼Yisra’el

3 and will·be·himself °the·one will·be·¬left in to·¬Zion and °the·one ¬leaving·behind in to·Yerushalam holy⁺ they·will·be·called all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼written to °life in to·Yerushalam

4 ¬that will·¬thoroughly·wash lord °the ⁼¬filth of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·¬Zion and °the ⁼blood will·¬clear·out out of·¬midst of·them in to·breath of·judgment and to·breath of·¬burning

5 and will·¬come and will·be·himself all ⁼¬place of·the ⁼mountain of·¬Zion and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·her will·¬shade cloud of·day and as of·¬smoke and as of·light ⁼fire of·self-¬kindling of·night to·all ⁼the ⁼¬glory will·be·¬sheltered

5 I·will·¬sing ¬so to·the ⁼having·self-loved °¬song of·the ⁼beloved to·the ⁼vineyard of·me vineyard was·been·generated to·the ⁼having·self-loved in to·horn in to·¬place ⁼¬plenty

2 and °¬fence I·¬put·on and I·¬built·a·palisade and I·¬planted °vine ⁼¬??? and I·¬built °tower in to·¬midst of·him and °¬wine·press I·¬dug in to·him and I·¬stayed of·the·one to·do °¬grape did then °¬thorns⁺

3 and now human of·the ⁼Yudah and the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling·in in to·Yerushalam ꜝjudge⁺ in to·me* and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼vineyard of·me

4 °what I·will·do ¬still to·the ⁼vineyard of·me and not I·did to·him ¬because I·¬stayed of·the·one to·do °¬grape did then °¬thorns⁺

5 now then I·will·¬announce to·you⁺ °what I·will·do to·the ⁼vineyard of·me I·will·¬remove °the ⁼¬fence of·him and will·be·himself to °¬ravaging and I·will·¬take·down °the ⁼wall of·him and will·be·himself to °¬trampling

6 and I·will·¬loosen °the ⁼vineyard of·me and not ńot should·be·¬pruned not·then ńot will·be·¬dug and will·¬ascend·himself to °him as to °¬uncultivated ⁼¬thorn and to·the⁺ ⁼clouds⁺ I·will·¬order·myself of·the·one ńot to·¬rain·down to °him ⁼¬rain

7 the·one for vineyard of·lord of·tzeba’ot house of·the ⁼Yisra’el is and human of·the ⁼Yudah ¬new·convert °having·self-loved I·¬stayed of·the·one to·do °judgment did then °¬lawlessness and not °justice but °¬shouting

8 ¬woe! the⁺ ⁼¬joining·together °house unto °house and °field unto °field ¬coming·near so·that of·the ⁼¬neighbor they·should·¬remove·themselves °whatever ńot you⁺·will·¬dwell ¬alone⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth

9 was·heard for to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·lord of·tzeba’ot °these⁺ ifᵮ for they·should·be·generated·themselves houses⁺ ⁼many⁺ to °¬deserted they·will·be·themselves great⁺ and beautiful⁺ and not they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling·in in to·them

10 ¬whither for they·work·themselves ten °¬yokes⁺ of·¬oxes⁺ will·do °pot ⁼one and the ⁼seeding °¬measures⁺ six will·do °¬measures⁺ ⁼three⁺

11 ¬woe! the⁺ ⁼self-¬arising °the·one ¬early and °the ⁼¬alcoholic·drink ¬pursuing ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬staying °the·one ¬late the·one for wine °them will·¬burn·with

12 with for of·guitar and of·¬psaltery and of·¬tamborines⁺ and of·flutes⁺ °the ⁼wine they·drink then °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·lord not they·¬look·into and °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him not they·¬observe

13 ¬then ¬captive ⁼the ⁼people of·me was·been·generated through °the·one ńot to·have·¬seen °them °the ⁼lord and °¬multitude was·been·generated of·corpses⁺ through °¬famine and °thirst of·water

14 and ¬widened the ⁼¬hell °the ⁼soul of·him and ¬opened·up °the ⁼mouth of·him of·the·one ńot to·¬stop and they·will·¬come·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬honored⁺ and the⁺ ⁼great⁺ and the⁺ ⁼rich⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬pestilence⁺ of·her

16 and will·be·¬lifted·up lord of·tzeba’ot in to·judgment and the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼holy will·be·¬glorified in to·justice

17 and they·will·be·¬feeded the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬robbed as ¬bulls⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬deserteds⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬gotten·back lambs⁺ they·will·¬eat·themselves

18 ¬woe! the⁺ ⁼self-¬uncircumcising °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ as to·¬rope ⁼¬long and as of·¬yoke to·¬leather·strap of·¬heifer °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺

19 the⁺ ⁼saying °the ⁼¬speed ꜝlet·¬come·near °which⁺ will·do so·that we·should·¬see and ꜝlet·come the ⁼¬plan of·the ⁼holy ⁼Yisra’el so·that we·should·know

20 ¬woe! the⁺ ⁼saying °the ⁼¬evil ⁼beautiful and °the ⁼beautiful ⁼¬evil the⁺ ⁼¬placing °the ⁼¬darkness ⁼light and °the ⁼light ⁼¬darkness the⁺ ⁼¬placing °the·one °¬bitter °¬sweet and °the ⁼¬sweet ⁼¬bitter

21 ¬woe! the⁺ ⁼¬intelligent⁺ in to·¬selves⁺ and ¬before of·¬selves⁺ ¬knowing⁺

22 ¬woe! the⁺ ⁼¬·strong of·you⁺ the·ones⁺ °the ⁼wine drinking and the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬mixing °the ⁼¬alcoholic·drink

23 the⁺ ⁼justifying °the ⁼¬ungodly ¬because·of of·¬gifts⁺ and °the·one °just of·the ⁼just ¬taking·up

24 through °this °which ⁼¬way will·be·¬kindled ¬straw ¬by of·¬charcoal ⁼fire and will·be·¬burned·with ¬by of·¬flame ⁼having·self-¬loosened the ⁼root of·them as °¬dust will·be·himself and °the ⁼¬flower of·them as ¬dust will·¬ascend·himself not for they·¬willed °the ⁼law of·lord of·tzeba’ot but °the ⁼¬oracles of·the ⁼holy ⁼Yisra’el they·¬provoked

25 and was·¬angered to·¬wrath lord of·tzeba’ot upon °the ⁼people of·him and ¬put·on °the ⁼hand of·him upon °them and ¬struck °them and was·¬provoked °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and was·been·generated °the⁺ ⁼¬decaying·flesh⁺ of·them as °¬manures⁺ in to·¬midst of·¬road and in to·all⁺ ⁼these⁺ not was·¬turned·away the ⁼¬wrath but ¬still the ⁼hand ⁼¬high

26 ¬therefore will·¬take·up °¬agreed·signal in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬far and will·¬hiss to·them off of·¬end of·the ⁼earth and ¬¡see! ¬quickly ¬nimbly they·come·themselves

27 not they·will·hunger not·then they·will·¬labor not·then they·will·¬doze not·then they·will·be·¬slept not·then they·will·¬loose °the⁺ ⁼¬belts⁺ of·them off of·the ⁼¬loins of·them not·then ńot they·should·be·¬thrown·violently the⁺ ⁼¬leather·straps⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬sandals⁺ of·them

28 ⁼which⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬arrows⁺ ¬sharp is and °the⁺ ⁼¬bows⁺ of·them °having·self-¬stretched·tight the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ of·them as °¬strong⁺ °rock they·were·¬counted the⁺ ⁼¬courses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·them as °¬blast

29 they·¬stampede as lions⁺ and they·have·¬stood·by as ¬cub of·lion and will·¬catch·himself and will·¬cry·out as of·¬wild·animal and will·throw·out and not will·be·himself the ⁼self-¬rescuing °them

30 and will·¬cry·out through °them in to·the ⁼day ⁼that as voice of·sea ⁼¬swelling·up and they·will·¬look·into·themselves to °the ⁼earth and ¬¡see! °¬darkness ⁼¬hard in to·the ⁼¬perplexity of·them

6 and was·generated·himself of·the ⁼¬year ⁼which died·off ¬Uzziah ⁼the ⁼king I·¬saw °the ⁼lord ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼¬high and of·self-¬lifting·up and ¬full ⁼the ⁼house of·the ⁼¬glory of·him

2 and ¬??? they·had·stood ¬surrounding of·him six wings⁺ to·the ⁼one and six wings⁺ to·the ⁼one and to·the·ones⁺ ¬on·the·other·hand to·two⁺ they·¬covered °the ⁼¬face and to·the⁺ ⁼two⁺ they·¬covered °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼two⁺ they·winged

3 and they·¬cried óther unto °the ⁼óther and they·said holy ⁼holy ⁼holy ⁼lord of·tzeba’ot ¬full all ⁼the ⁼earth of·the ⁼¬glory of·him

4 and was·¬lifted·up °the ⁼¬lintel off of·the ⁼voice ⁼which they·¬cried and the ⁼house was·¬filled of·¬smoke

5 and I·told ¬oh! ¬miserable I* ¬that I·have·¬pierced·myself ¬that human ⁼being and °¬unclean⁺ ⁼lips⁺ having in to·¬midst of·people °¬unclean⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·having I* I·¬dwell and °the ⁼king ⁼lord of·tzeba’ot I·¬saw to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·me

9 and told ꜝ¬travel·yourself and they·told to·the ⁼people ⁼this to·hearsay you⁺·will·hear and not ńot you⁺·should·¬understand and looking you⁺·will·look and not ńot you⁺·should·¬see

10 was·¬thickened for the ⁼heart of·the ⁼people ⁼this and to·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·them ¬difficultly they·heard and °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·them they·¬closed ¬lest they·should·¬see to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ they·should·hear and to·the ⁼heart they·should·¬understand and they·should·¬turn and I·will·¬heal °them

11 and I·told ¬until ¬when? lord and told ¬until iᵮ they·should·be·¬layed·waste cities⁺ ¬from °the·one ńot to·self-¬dwell and houses⁺ ¬from °the·one ńot to·be °humans⁺ and the ⁼earth will·be·¬left·behind ¬deserted

7 and was·generated·himself in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Ahaz ⁼the ⁼¬Jotham ⁼the ⁼son ⁼¬Uzziah ⁼king ⁼Yudah ¬ascended Raassōn ⁼king of·¬Ram and Fakee ⁼son Romeliou king of·Yisra’el upon °Yerushalam to·war °her and not they·were·been·able ꜝ¬assault·yourself °her

2 and was·¬announced to °the ⁼house of·David saying ¬agreed·with ¬Ram unto °the ⁼¬Ephraim and ¬amazed the ⁼soul of·him and the ⁼soul of·the ⁼people of·him °which ⁼¬way ¬when in to·¬grove °¬wood ¬by of·breath should·be·¬shaken

4 and you·will·¬say to·him ꜝ¬keep·yourself of·the·one to·¬be·quiet and ńot ꜝ¬fear·yourself ńot·then the ⁼soul of·you ꜝlet·¬be·weak off of·the·ones⁺ two of·¬woods⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬firebrands⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬smoking ⁼these⁺ ¬when for ¬wrath of·the ⁼¬wrath of·me should·be·generated·himself ¬again I·will·¬heal·myself

18 through °¬wrath of·¬wrath of·lord has·¬burned·with·himself the ⁼earth ⁼¬all and will·be·himself the ⁼people as ¬by of·fire having·self-¬burned ⁼human °the ⁼brother of·him not will·¬have·mercy

10 ¬woe! to·the⁺ ⁼writing °¬evil writing for °¬evil to·writing

3 and °what they·will·do in to·the ⁼day of·the ⁼¬oversight the·one for ¬pressure to·you⁺ ¬afar·off will·¬come and unto °what you⁺·will·¬flee·yourselves⁺ of·the·one to·be·¬helped and ¬where? you⁺·will·¬leave·behind °the ⁼¬glory of·you⁺

6 °the ⁼¬wrath of·me to °nation ⁼¬lawless I·will·mission·off and to·the·one myˊ to·people I·will·¬direct to·do °¬plunders⁺ and °¬plunder and to·¬trample °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ and to·¬place °them to °¬dust

7 he then not thus was·¬reflected·on and to·the ⁼soul not thus to·have·self-¬counted but will·¬release the ⁼¬mind of·him and of·the·one °nations⁺ to·¬root·out not °¬little⁺

8 and ifᵮ they·should·tell to·him you ¬alone you·are ¬ruler

9 and will·¬say not I·took °the ⁼¬country ⁼the·one ¬above of·¬Babylon and Chalannē ¬whither the ⁼tower was·¬built and I·took °¬Arabia and °¬Damascus and °¬Samaria

10 °which ⁼¬way °these⁺ I·took in to·the ⁼hand of·me and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬beginnings⁺ I·will·take·myself ꜝ¬wail⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬carving⁺ in to·Yerushalam and in to·¬Samaria

11 °which ⁼¬way for I·did to·¬Samaria and to·the⁺ ⁼¬hand-made⁺ of·her thus I·will·do and to·Yerushalam and to·the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·her

12 and will·be·himself ¬when should·¬complete lord °all of·¬what?⁺ in to·the ⁼mountain °¬Zion and in to·Yerushalam will·¬bring·upon upon °the ⁼¬mind ⁼the ⁼great ⁼the ⁼¬ruler of·the⁺ Assuriōn and upon °the ⁼¬height of·the ⁼¬glory of·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·him

13 told for to·the ⁼¬strength I·will·do and to·the ⁼wisdom of·the ⁼¬understanding I·will·¬remove °¬regions⁺ of·nations⁺ and °the ⁼¬strength of·them you·will·¬despoil and I·will·¬shake °cities⁺ ⁼self-¬dwelling

14 and °the ⁼¬world ⁼¬all I·will·¬grasp·myself to·the ⁼hand as °¬chick and as °having·self-¬left·behind ⁼¬eggs⁺ I·will·¬take·up and not is which will·¬escape·himself °me or will·¬contradict·himself to·me

15 ńot will·be·¬glorified ¬axe ¬without of·the ⁼chopping in to·her or will·be·¬lifted·up ¬saw ¬without of·the ⁼¬drawing °him ¬likewise ifᵮ whatever should·¬take·up °¬rod or °¬wood

16 and not thus but will·mission·off lord of·tzeba’ot to °the·one your °¬honor ⁼¬dishonour and to °the·one your °¬glory °fire °self-¬kindling will·be·¬kindled

2 you·will·be·yourself for as of·wingling ⁼self-¬flying·about ¬nestling ⁼having·self-¬removed daughter Mōab ¬then then lamb

3 °¬greater ꜝ¬plan·yourself ꜝdo⁺ °¬shelter of·¬grief to·her through of·all in to·¬midday ⁼¬darkness they·¬flee they·¬amazed ńot you·should·be·¬led·away

4 they·will·¬be·a·stranger to·you the⁺ ⁼¬exiles⁺ Mōab they·will·be·themselves ¬shelter to·you⁺ off of·¬face of·¬pursuing ¬that was·¬taken·up the ⁼¬alliance·in·war of·you and the ⁼¬ruler ¬destroyed·himself the ⁼¬trampling upon of·the ⁼earth

5 and will·be·¬set·right with °mercies⁺ throne and will·¬seat·himself upon of·him with of·¬truth in to·¬tent of·David judging and ¬seeking·out °judgment and ¬hastening °justice

6 we·heard °the ⁼¬mistreatment Mōab of·¬insolent·man ¬very °the ⁼¬pride °¬dried·up⁺ not thus the ⁼¬oracle of·you

7 not thus will·¬wail Mōab in for to·the Mōabitidi all⁺ they·will·¬wail to·the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling ¬??? you·will·¬meditate and not you·were·¬caused·shame

8 the⁺ ⁼¬plains⁺ Esebōn will·¬mourn vine Sebama ¬swallowing °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ꜝ¬trample⁺ °the⁺ ⁼vines⁺ of·her ¬until Iazēr not ńot you⁺·should·¬join·together you⁺·should·be·¬led·astray °the ⁼¬deserted the⁺ ⁼having·self-missioned·off they·were·¬left·behind they·¬crossed for °the ⁼¬deserted

9 through °this I·will·¬weep·myself as °the ⁼¬weeping Iazēr °vine Sebama °the⁺ ⁼trees⁺ of·you ¬layed Esebōn and Elealē ¬that upon to·the ⁼¬harvest and upon to·the ⁼¬gathering·of·crops of·you I·will·¬trample and °all⁺ will·¬collapse·himself

10 and will·be·¬taken·up ¬joy and ¬leap·for·joy out of·the⁺ ⁼vineyards⁺ of·you and in to·the⁺ ⁼vineyards⁺ of·you not ńot they·will·be·¬celebrated and not ńot they·will·¬trample °wine to °the⁺ ⁼¬troughs⁺ has·¬ceased·himself for

17 the ⁼¬declaration ⁼the·one ¬according·to of·¬Damascus ¬¡see! of·¬Damascus will·be·¬taken·up off of·cities⁺ and will·be·himself to °¬fall

2 having·self-¬left·behind to °the ⁼eternity to °¬bed of·¬flocks⁺ and °¬rest and not will·be·himself the ⁼¬pursuing

25 in to·the ⁼day ⁼that °¬these⁺ says lord of·tzeba’ot will·be·¬moved the ⁼human ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬established in to·¬place ⁼¬faithful and will·¬collapse and will·be·¬removed the ⁼¬glory ⁼the·one upon °him ¬that lord spoke

23 the ⁼¬vision of·¬Tyre ꜝ¬wail⁺ sailboats⁺ Karchēdonos ¬that ¬destroyed·himself and ¬not·any·more they·come·themselves out of·earth Kitiaiōn has·¬brought·himself ¬captive

2 to·what ¬like⁺ they·have·been·generated the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling·in in to·the ⁼¬island ¬traders⁺ of·¬Phoenicia ¬crossing °the ⁼sea

3 in to·water ⁼much °seed of·¬traders⁺ as of·¬harvest ⁼self-¬bringing·in the⁺ ⁼¬traders⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

4 ꜝbe·¬been·ashamed ¬Sidon told the ⁼sea then ⁼the ⁼¬strength of·the ⁼sea told not I·¬was·in·labor not·then I·¬gave·birth·to not·then I·¬nourished °youths⁺ not·then ¬lifting·up °virgins⁺

6 ꜝcome·off⁺ to Karchēdona ꜝ¬wail⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling·in in to·the ⁼¬island ⁼this

9 lord of·tzeba’ot ¬planed·himself to·¬paralyze °all ⁼the ⁼¬mistreatment of·the⁺ ⁼¬honored⁺ and to·¬dishonor °all ⁼¬honored upon of·the ⁼earth

10 ꜝwork·yourself °the ⁼earth of·you and for sailboats⁺ ¬not·any·more comes·himself out Karchēdonos

11 then the ⁼hand of·you ¬not·any·more ¬is·strong ¬according·to °sea the ⁼¬provoking °kings⁺ lord of·tzeba’ot ¬ordered·himself about of·¬Canaan to·¬destroy of·her °the ⁼¬strength

27 not for with of·¬hardness ¬prunes·himself °the ⁼¬pepperwort not·then ¬course of·¬wagon will·¬take upon °the ⁼cumin but to·¬rod will·¬shake·out·himself °the ⁼¬pepperwort then ⁼the ⁼cumin

28 with of·bread will·be·¬eaten not for to °the ⁼eternity I* to·you⁺ I·will·be·¬angered not·then voice of·the ⁼¬bitterness of·me will·¬trample °you⁺

29 and these⁺ ¬from of·lord of·tzeba’ot came·out the·ones⁺ ¬wonders ꜝ¬plan⁺·yourselves⁺ ꜝ¬lift·up⁺ °¬futile ⁼¬encouragement

29 ¬woe! city Ariēl °which David warred ꜝ¬assemble⁺ °¬offsprings⁺ °¬year upon °¬year you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ for wiŧh Mōab

2 I·will·¬squeeze·out for Ariēl and will·be·himself of·her the ⁼¬strength and the ⁼riches to·me*

3 and I·will·¬surround as °David upon °you and I·will·throw about °you °¬barricade and I·will·¬place about °you °towers⁺

4 and they·will·be·¬humbled the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·you to °the ⁼earth and to °the ⁼earth the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·you they·will·¬set·themselves and will·be·himself as the⁺ ⁼¬calling out of·the ⁼earth the ⁼voice of·you and unto °the ⁼¬ground the ⁼voice of·you will·¬be·weak

5 and will·be·himself as ¬dust off of·¬course the ⁼riches of·the⁺ ⁼¬ungodly⁺ and as ¬dust ⁼self-¬bearing and will·be·himself as ¬instant ¬instantly

6 ¬from of·lord of·tzeba’ot ¬oversight for will·be·himself with of·¬thunder and of·¬earthquake and of·voice ⁼great ¬blast ⁼self-¬bearing and ¬flame of·fire ¬devouring

7 and will·be·himself as the ⁼self-¬dreaming in to·¬sleep the ⁼riches of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼all⁺ whatever⁺ they·¬marched·against upon Ariēl and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬battling upon °Yerushalam and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬assembled upon °her and ¬pressing·on °her

8 and they·will·be·themselves as the·ones⁺ in to·¬sleep drinking and ¬eating and ¬raising·up ¬futile of·them the ⁼¬dream and °which ⁼¬way ¬dreams·himself the ⁼thirsting as drinking and ¬raising·up ¬still thirsts then the ⁼soul of·him to °¬empty ¬hoped thus will·be·himself the ⁼riches of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ whatever⁺ they·¬marched·against upon °the ⁼mountain °¬Zion

9 you⁺·should·be·¬fainted and you⁺·should·¬amaze and you⁺·¬were·dizzy·from·wine not off °¬alcoholic·drink not·then off of·wine

10 ¬that has·¬watered °you⁺ lord to·breath of·¬stupor and will·¬close °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·them and of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·them and of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them the⁺ ⁼¬seeing °the⁺ ⁼¬hidden⁺

11 and they·will·be·themselves to·you⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ as the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the ⁼¬scroll ⁼the ⁼having·self-sealed of·this which ifᵮ they·should·give °it to·human ⁼self-¬knowing °¬something·writtens⁺ saying ꜝ¬read °these⁺ and will·¬say not I·am·able·myself to·¬read has·sealed·himself for

12 and will·be·given the ⁼¬scroll ⁼this to °hands⁺ of·human ńot of·self-¬knowing °¬something·writtens⁺ and will·¬say to·him ꜝ¬read °this and will·¬say not I·¬know·myself °¬something·writtens⁺

13 and told lord ¬comes·near to·me the ⁼people ⁼this to·the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·them they·¬honor °me then the ⁼heart of·them ¬far ¬has·in·full off myˊ ¬in·vain then they·¬are·devout·themselves °me ¬teaching °¬precepts⁺ of·humans⁺ and °¬teachings⁺

14 through °this ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬add of·the·one to·¬transport °the ⁼people ⁼this and I·will·¬transport °them and I·will·¬destroy °the ⁼wisdom of·the⁺ ⁼wise⁺ and °the ⁼¬understanding of·the⁺ ⁼¬intelligent⁺ I·will·¬hide

15 ¬woe! the·ones⁺ °¬deep ⁼¬plan doing and not through of·lord ¬woe! the·ones⁺ in ¬in·secret °¬plan doing and will·be·himself in to·¬darkness the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·them and they·will·¬say what °us has·¬seen and what °us will·know·himself or °which⁺ we we·do

16 not as the ⁼¬clay of·the ⁼potter you⁺·will·be·¬counted ńot will·¬say the ⁼¬formed·thing to·the ⁼¬molding not you °me you·¬molded or the ⁼deed to·the ⁼doing not ¬expertly °me you·did

17 ¬not·any·more °¬small and will·be·¬transported the Libanos as °the ⁼mountain ⁼the Chermel and the ⁼mountain ⁼the Chermel to °¬grove will·be·¬counted

18 and they·will·hear·themselves in to·the ⁼day ⁼that ¬deaf⁺ °sayings⁺ of·¬scroll and the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼¬darkness and the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼¬fog ¬eyes⁺ of·¬blind⁺ they·will·look·themselves

19 and they·will·¬rejoice·themselves ¬poors⁺ through °lord in to·¬joy and the⁺ ⁼self-¬despairing of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ they·will·be·¬filled·up of·¬joy

20 ¬failed ¬lawless and ¬destroyed·himself ¬arrogant and they·were·¬rooted·out the⁺ ⁼going·to·¬act·lawlessly upon to·evil

21 and the⁺ ⁼doing to·sin °humans⁺ in to·saying °all⁺ then °the⁺ ⁼¬rebuking in to·gates⁺ °¬stumbling·block they·will·¬place and they·¬bended in to·¬unjust⁺ °just

22 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord upon °the ⁼house of·Ya‘aqob °which ¬separated out of·Abraham not now will·be·¬been·ashamed Ya‘aqob not·then now °the ⁼¬face will·¬change·mind of·Yisra’el

23 but ¬when they·should·¬see the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·them °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·me through °me* they·will·make·holy °the ⁼name of·me and they·will·make·holy °the ⁼holy of·Ya‘aqob and °the ⁼God of·the ⁼Yisra’el they·will·be·¬feared

24 and they·will·know·themselves the·ones⁺ to·the ⁼breath self-¬leading·astray °¬understanding then the⁺ ⁼¬murmuring they·will·study·themselves to·¬obey and the⁺ ⁼tongues⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬stuttering they·will·study·themselves to·speak °peace

30 ¬woe! ¬children⁺ ¬defectors⁺ °¬these⁺ says lord you⁺·did °¬plan not through myˊ and °¬treaties⁺ not through of·the·one of·breath of·me to·¬add of·sin upon to·sins⁺

2 the⁺ ⁼self-¬travelling to·¬come to °Egypt °me* then not they·¬questioned of·the·one to·be·¬helped ¬by of·Pharaoh and to·be·¬sheltered ¬by of·Egyptians⁺

3 will·be·himself for to·you⁺ the ⁼¬shelter of·Pharaoh to °¬shame and to·the⁺ ⁼having·¬persuaded upon °Egypt °¬disgrace

4 ¬that they·are in Tanei ¬founders⁺ ⁼¬announcers⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ ¬in·vain they·will·¬labor

5 unto °people which not will·¬help °them not·also to °¬help not·also to °¬advantage but to °¬shame and °¬disgrace

6 the ⁼¬appearance of·the⁺ ⁼four-footed⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼¬deserted in to·the ⁼¬pressure and to·the ⁼¬hardship lion and ¬cub of·lion ¬from·there and asps⁺ and ¬descendant⁺ of·asps⁺ ⁼self-winging which⁺ they·¬bore upon of·donkeys⁺ and of·camels⁺ °the ⁼riches of·them unto °nation which not will·¬help °them to °¬help but to °¬shame and °¬disgrace

7 Egyptians⁺ ¬futile⁺ and ¬empty⁺ they·will·¬help °you⁺ ꜝ¬announce to·them ¬that ¬futile ⁼the ⁼¬encouragement of·you⁺ this

8 now therefore ¬seating ꜝwrite upon of·¬writing·tablet °these⁺ and to °¬scroll ¬that will·be·himself to of·day of·¬times⁺ °these⁺ and ¬until to °the ⁼eternity

9 ¬that people ⁼¬disobedient is sons⁺ ⁼lying⁺ ⁼which⁺ not they·¬planed·themselves to·hear °the ⁼law of·the ⁼God

10 the⁺ ⁼saying to·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ ńot ꜝ¬announce⁺ to·us and to·the·ones⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬visions⁺ they·¬see ńot ꜝspeak⁺ to·us but to·us ꜝspeak⁺ and ꜝ¬announce⁺ to·us °óther ⁼¬delusion

11 and ꜝ¬turn·away⁺ °us off of·the ⁼¬road ⁼this ꜝ¬remove⁺ off of·us °the ⁼¬path ⁼this and ꜝ¬remove⁺ off of·us °the ⁼holy of·the ⁼Yisra’el

12 through °this thus says lord ⁼the ⁼holy of·the ⁼Yisra’el ¬that you⁺·¬disobeyed to·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ and you⁺·¬hoped upon to·lie and ¬that you·¬murmured and having·¬persuaded you·were·generated·yourself upon to·the ⁼saying ⁼this

13 through °this will·be·himself to·you⁺ the ⁼sin ⁼this as °wall ⁼¬collapsing ¬instantly of·city ⁼¬fortified ⁼having·¬captured ⁼which ¬instantly ¬is·present the ⁼¬corpse

14 and the ⁼¬corpse of·her will·be·himself as °¬ruin of·¬jar ⁼¬clay out of·pot °¬coin⁺ ¬so ńot to·find in to·them °¬potsherd in to·which °fire you·will·¬take·up and in to·which you·will·¬whistle °water ⁼¬small

16 but you⁺·told upon of·horses⁺ we·will·¬flee·ourselves through °this you⁺·will·¬flee·yourselves⁺ and you⁺·told upon to·¬light⁺ ¬riders⁺ we·will·be·ourselves through °this ¬light⁺ they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬pursuing °you⁺

17 through °voice of·one they·will·¬flee·themselves thousand⁺ and through °voice five they·will·¬flee·themselves many⁺ ¬until iᵮ you⁺·should·be·¬left·behind as ¬mast upon of·mountain and as °¬flag ¬bearing upon of·¬hill

18 and ¬again will·¬stay the ⁼God of·the·one to·¬have·compassion °you⁺ and through °this will·be·¬lifted·up of·the·one to·¬have·mercy °you⁺ ¬because judge ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us is and ¬where? you⁺·will·¬leave·behind °the ⁼¬glory of·you⁺ blessed⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬abiding·in in to·him

20 and will·give lord to·you⁺ °bread of·¬pressure and °water ⁼¬narrow and ¬not·any·more ńot they·should·¬come·near to·you the⁺ ⁼¬leading·astray °you ¬that the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you they·will·¬see·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬leading·astray °you

22 and you·will·¬expel °the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬silvered·plate and °the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬gilded ⁼¬coin⁺ you·will·do and you⁺·will·¬crush as water of·self-¬sitting·apart and as °¬dung you·will·¬thrust·through °them

23 ŧhen will·be·himself the ⁼¬rain to·the ⁼seed of·the ⁼earth of·you and the ⁼bread of·the ⁼¬offspring of·the ⁼earth of·you will·be·himself ¬gratification and ¬rich and will·be·¬feeded of·you the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ to·the ⁼day ⁼that °¬place ⁼¬plenty and °¬broad

25 and will·be·himself upon of·all ⁼mountain ⁼¬high and upon of·all ⁼¬hill ⁼¬meteorite water ⁼self-¬going·through in to·the ⁼day ⁼that ¬when they·should·¬destroy·themselves many⁺ and ¬when they·will·¬collapse towers⁺

27 ¬¡see! the ⁼name of·lord through of·¬time comes·himself of·much self-¬kindling ⁼the ⁼¬wrath with of·¬glory the ⁼¬oracles of·the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·him the ⁼¬oracles of·¬wrath ¬full and the ⁼¬wrath of·the ⁼¬wrath as °fire will·¬eat·himself

29 ńot through of·all ¬is·necessary °you⁺ to·self-¬celebrate and to·self-¬enter to °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me through of·all ¬like °¬keeping·a·festival and ¬like °self-¬celebrating to·come·to with of·flute to °the ⁼mountain of·the ⁼lord unto °the ⁼God of·the ⁼Yisra’el

30 and °¬audible will·do the ⁼God °the ⁼¬glory of·the ⁼voice of·him and °the ⁼¬wrath of·the ⁼arm of·him will·¬show with of·¬wrath and of·¬wrath and of·¬flame ⁼¬devouring will·¬strike·with·a·thunderbolt ¬forcibly and as water and ¬hail ⁼self-¬carrying·together to·¬force

33 you for ¬before of·days⁺ you·will·be·¬demanded ńot and to·you was·¬made·ready to·become·king °¬valley ⁼¬deep °¬woods⁺ ⁼self-¬laying °fire and °¬woods⁺ ⁼many⁺ the ⁼¬wrath of·lord as ¬valley ¬by of·¬divine self-¬kindling

31 ¬woe! the⁺ ⁼¬coming to °Egypt upon °¬help the·ones⁺ upon to·horses⁺ having·¬persuaded and upon to·¬chariots⁺ is for much and upon to·horses⁺ °¬multitude ¬very and not they·were having·¬persuaded upon °the ⁼holy of·the ⁼Yisra’el and °the ⁼God not they·¬sought·out

2 and he ⁼wise ¬brought upon °them °evil⁺ and the ⁼saying of·him not ńot will·be·¬rejected and will·¬rebel·against·himself upon °houses⁺ of·humans⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ and upon °the ⁼¬hope of·them °the ⁼¬futile

3 °Egyptian ⁼human and not °God of·horses⁺ °fleshes⁺ and not is ¬help then the ⁼lord will·¬bring·upon °the ⁼hand of·him upon °them and they·will·¬labor the⁺ ⁼¬helping and ¬together all⁺ they·will·¬destroy·themselves

4 ¬that thus told to·me lord °which ⁼¬way ifᵮ should·¬cry·out the ⁼lion or the ⁼¬cub upon to·the ⁼¬trap ⁼which took and you·will·¬cry·yourself upon to·her ¬until iᵮ should·be·¬filled·up °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ of·the ⁼voice of·him and they·were·¬been·lesser and °the ⁼¬multitude of·the ⁼¬wrath they·were·¬frightened thus will·¬come·himself lord of·tzeba’ot to·¬march·against upon °the ⁼mountain ⁼the·one ¬Zion upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ of·her

6 ꜝbe·¬turned⁺ the·ones⁺ °the ⁼¬deep ⁼¬plan self-¬planing and °¬lawless

32 ¬¡see! for king ⁼just will·become·king and ¬rulers⁺ with of·judgment they·will·¬be·first

2 and will·be·himself the ⁼human ⁼¬hiding °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·him and will·be·¬hidden as off of·water of·self-¬bearing and will·be·¬shined in to·¬Zion as ¬river ⁼self-¬bearing ⁼¬honored in to·earth ⁼thirsting

3 and ¬not·any·more they·will·be·themselves having·¬persuaded upon to·humans⁺ but °the·ones⁺ °ear they·will·give to·hear

4 and the ⁼heart of·the⁺ ⁼¬·weak will·¬watch·out of·the·one to·hear and the⁺ ⁼tongues⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬stuttering ¬quickly they·will·study·themselves to·speak °peace

5 and ¬not·any·more ńot they·should·tell to·the ⁼¬foolish to·¬be·first and ¬not·any·more ńot they·should·tell the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·you ꜝ¬be·silent

6 the·one for ¬foolish °¬foolish⁺ will·speak and the ⁼heart of·him °¬futile⁺ will·¬understand of·the·one to·¬complete °¬lawless⁺ and to·speak unto °lord °¬delusion of·the·one to·¬scatter °souls⁺ ⁼hungering and °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼thirsting ⁼¬empty⁺ to·do

7 the·one for ¬plan of·the⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ °¬lawless⁺ will·¬plan·himself to·¬deprave °¬lowly⁺ in to·sayings⁺ ⁼¬unjust⁺ and to·¬disperse °sayings⁺ of·¬lowly⁺ in to·judgment

8 then the⁺ ⁼¬pious⁺ °¬intelligent⁺ they·¬planed·themselves and this ⁼the ⁼¬plan will·¬stay

9 women⁺ ⁼rich⁺ ꜝ¬arise⁺ and ꜝhear⁺ of·the ⁼voice of·me daughters⁺ in to·¬hope ꜝhear⁺ °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me

10 of·day of·¬year °¬remembrance ꜝdo⁺·yourselves⁺ in to·¬anguish with of·¬hope has·been·¬consumed the ⁼¬gathering·of·crops has·¬ceased·himself the ⁼seed and ¬not·any·more ńot should·come

11 ꜝ¬amaze⁺ ꜝbe·¬grieved⁺ the⁺ ⁼having·¬persuaded ꜝ¬strip⁺·yourselves⁺ naked⁺ ꜝbe·generated⁺·yourselves⁺ ꜝ¬gird⁺·yourselves⁺ °¬sackcloths⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬loinses⁺

14 houses⁺ ⁼having·self-¬left·behind °riches of·city and °houses⁺ ⁼¬desirable⁺ they·will·¬release and they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬villages⁺ °caves⁺ ¬until of·the ⁼eternity ¬joy of·donkeys⁺ ⁼of·the·field⁺ ¬pastureds⁺ of·¬flocksmans⁺

15 ¬until iᵮ should·¬arrive upon °you⁺ breath off of·¬high and will·be·himself ¬deserted the Chermel and the Chermel to °¬grove will·be·¬counted

16 and will·¬give·rest·himself in to·the ⁼¬deserted judgment and justice in to·the Karmēlō will·¬dwell

17 and will·be·himself the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the ⁼justice peace and will·¬grasp the ⁼justice °¬rest and having·¬persuaded ¬until of·the ⁼eternity

18 and will·¬dwell the ⁼people of·him in to·city of·peace and will·¬dwell·in having·¬persuaded and they·will·¬give·rest·themselves with of·riches

19 then the ⁼¬hail ifᵮ should·¬come not upon °you⁺ will·¬come and they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling·in in to·the⁺ ⁼¬groves⁺ having·¬persuaded as the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼¬level

20 blessed⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼seeding upon all ⁼water of·which ¬ox and donkey ¬tramples

33 ¬woe! to·the·ones⁺ they·¬grieve °you⁺ °you⁺ then no·one does °¬wretched⁺ and the ⁼¬rejecting °you⁺ not ¬rejects they·will·¬capture·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬rejecting and they·will·be·¬delivered and as your upon of·cloak thus they·will·be·¬been·lesser

2 lord ꜝ¬have·mercy °us upon to·you for we·have·¬persuaded was·been·generated the ⁼seed of·the⁺ ⁼¬disobeying to °¬destruction then the ⁼¬salvation of·us in to·¬time of·¬pressure

3 through °voice of·the ⁼¬fear of·you they·¬amazed peoples⁺ off of·the ⁼¬fear of·you and they·were·¬scattered °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

4 now then will·be·¬assembled the⁺ ⁼¬plunders⁺ of·you⁺ of·¬small and of·great °which ⁼¬way ifᵮ whatever should·¬assemble °¬locusts⁺ thus they·will·¬mock to·you⁺

5 holy ⁼the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬dwelling in to·¬high⁺ was·¬filled·up ¬Zion of·judgment and of·justice

6 in to·law they·will·be·¬delivered in to·treasures⁺ the ⁼¬salvation of·us there wisdom and ¬higher·knowledge and ¬piety unto °the ⁼lord these⁺ they·are treasures⁺ of·justice

7 ¬¡see! ¬so in to·the ⁼¬fear of·you⁺ they they·will·be·¬feared °which⁺ you⁺·¬feared·yourselves⁺ they·will·be·¬feared off of·you⁺ ¬announcers⁺ for they·will·be·missioned·off ¬deeming·worthy °peace ¬bitterly ¬weeping ⁼¬pleading °peace

8 they·will·be·¬layed·waste for the·ones⁺ of·these⁺ ¬roads⁺ has·¬ceased·himself the ⁼¬fear of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and the·one unto °these⁺ ¬covenant is·¬taken·up and not ńot you⁺·will·¬count·yourselves⁺ °them ⁼humans⁺

9 ¬mourned the ⁼earth was·¬been·ashamed the Libanos °¬marshes⁺ was·generated·himself the ⁼¬Sharon °¬clear⁺ will·be·himself the ⁼Galylaia and the Karmēlos

10 now I·will·¬arise·myself says lord now I·will·be·¬glorified now I·will·be·¬lifted·up

11 now you⁺·will·¬see·yourselves⁺ now you⁺·will·¬perceive·yourselves⁺ ¬futile⁺ will·be·himself the ⁼¬strength of·the ⁼breath of·you⁺ °fire °you⁺ will·¬devour·himself

12 and they·will·be·themselves nations⁺ ⁼having·self-¬burned as °¬thorn in to·field having·been·¬thrown and having·been·¬burned

13 they·will·hear·themselves the·ones⁺ ¬afar·off °which⁺ I·did they·will·know·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬coming·near °the ⁼¬strength of·me

14 they·¬left the·ones⁺ in to·¬Zion ¬lawless⁺ will·take·himself ¬trembling °the⁺ ⁼¬ungodly⁺ what will·¬announce to·you⁺ ¬that °fire is·¬kindled what will·¬announce to·you⁺ °the ⁼¬place ⁼the ⁼eternal

15 self-¬travelling in to·justice speaking °¬straight ⁼¬road ¬hating °¬lawlessness and °¬unrighteousness and °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ self-¬shaking·off off of·¬gifts⁺ ¬weighing·down °the·ones⁺ °ear so·that ńot should·hear °judgment of·blood ¬closing °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ so·that ńot should·¬see °¬unrighteousness

16 this will·¬dwell in to·¬high to·cave of·rock ⁼¬strong bread to·him will·be·given and the ⁼water of·him °¬faithful

17 ⁼king with of·¬glory you⁺·will·¬see·yourselves⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you⁺ they·will·¬see·themselves °earth ¬afar·off

18 the ⁼soul of·you⁺ will·¬meditate °¬fear ¬where? they·are the⁺ ⁼¬academic⁺ ¬where? they·are the⁺ ⁼¬consulting ¬where? is the ⁼¬numbering °the⁺ ⁼self-¬feeding

19 °¬small and °great ⁼people to·which not they·¬consulted·themselves not·then has·¬seen °¬deep·voiced ¬so ńot to·hear people ⁼having·self-¬treated·as·worthless and not is to·the ⁼hearing ¬understanding

20 ¬¡see! ¬Zion ⁼the ⁼city the ⁼¬saving of·us the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you they·will·¬see·themselves °Yerushalam ⁼city rich⁺ ¬tents⁺ ⁼which⁺ not ńot they·should·be·¬shaken not·then ńot they·should·be·¬moved the⁺ ⁼¬pegs⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·her to °the ⁼eternity ⁼¬time not·then °the⁺ ⁼¬ropes⁺ of·her not ńot they·should·be·¬torn

21 ¬that the ⁼name of·lord great to·you⁺ ¬place to·you⁺ will·be·himself ¬rivers⁺ and ¬aqueducts⁺ ¬street⁺ and ¬broad⁺ not will·¬travel·himself °this ⁼the ⁼¬road not·then will·¬travel·himself sailboat ⁼¬driving

22 the·one for God of·me great is not will·¬pass·by·himself °me lord ⁼judge of·us lord ⁼¬ruler of·us lord ⁼king of·us lord ⁼this °us will·¬save

23 they·were·¬thrown·violently °the⁺ ⁼¬ropes⁺ of·you ¬that not ¬strengthened the ⁼¬mast of·you ¬bowed not will·¬lower °the⁺ ⁼¬shrouds⁺ not will·¬take·up °sign ¬until of·which should·be·¬delivered to °¬plunder ¬then many⁺ ⁼¬lame⁺ °¬plunder they·will·do

24 and not ńot should·tell I·¬labor the ⁼people ⁼the ⁼¬dwelling·in in to·them will·be·¬released for to·them the ⁼sin

34 ꜝ¬bring·near⁺ nations⁺ and ꜝhear⁺ ¬rulers⁺ ꜝlet·hear the ⁼earth and the·ones⁺ in to·her the ⁼¬world and the ⁼people ⁼the·one in to·her

2 ¬because ¬wrath of·lord upon °all °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and ¬wrath upon °the ⁼¬number of·them of·the·one to·¬destroy °them and to·¬deliver °them to °¬slaughter

3 then the⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ of·them they·will·be·¬thrown and the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ and will·¬ascend·himself of·them the ⁼¬aroma and will·be·¬rained·down the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ off of·the ⁼blood of·them

4 and will·be·¬rolled·up the ⁼heaven as °¬scroll and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼stars⁺ will·¬collapse·himself as °¬leafs⁺ out of·vine and as ¬collapses °¬leafs⁺ off of·¬fig·tree

5 was·¬gotten·drunk the ⁼¬sword of·me in to·the ⁼heaven ¬¡see! upon °the ⁼¬Idumea will·¬come·himself and upon °the ⁼people of·the ⁼¬destruction with of·judgment

6 the ⁼¬sword of·lord was·¬filled·up of·blood was·¬thickened off of·¬fat of·lambs⁺ and off of·¬fat of·¬he-goats⁺ and of·¬rams⁺ ¬that ¬sacrifice to·lord in to·¬Beor and ¬slaughter ⁼great in to·the ⁼¬Idumea

7 and they·will·¬be·downcast·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬stout⁺ with of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬rams⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬bulls⁺ and will·be·¬gotten·drunk the ⁼earth off of·the ⁼blood and off of·the ⁼¬fat of·them will·be·¬filled·up

8 day for of·judgment of·lord and ¬year of·¬reward ⁼judgment ⁼¬Zion

9 and they·will·be·¬turned of·her the⁺ ⁼¬valleys⁺ to °¬pitch and the ⁼earth of·her to °¬divine and will·be·himself of·her the ⁼earth ⁼self-¬kindling as ¬???

10 of·night and of·day and not will·be·¬extinguished to °the ⁼eternity ⁼¬time and will·¬ascend·himself the ⁼¬smoke of·her ¬above to °generations⁺ will·be·¬layed·waste and to °¬time ⁼much

11 and they·will·¬dwell in to·her ¬birds⁺ and ¬hedgehogs⁺ and ¬ibises⁺ and ¬ravens⁺ and will·be·¬put·on upon °her °¬cord of·¬surveying ⁼¬deserted and ¬satyrs⁺ they·will·¬dwell in to·her

12 the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·her not they·will·be·themselves the·ones⁺ for kings⁺ of·her and the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·her and the⁺ ⁼¬great·mans⁺ of·her they·will·be·themselves to °¬destruction

13 and will·¬grow·up to °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·them °¬thorny⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ and to °the⁺ ⁼¬strongholds⁺ of·her and will·be·himself ¬residence of·¬sirens⁺ and ¬palace of·¬ostriches⁺

14 and they·will·¬meet ¬demons⁺ to·¬satyrs⁺ and they·will·¬cry·out óther unto °the ⁼óther there they·will·¬give·rest·themselves ¬satyrs⁺ they·found for to·¬selves⁺ °¬rest

15 there ¬nested ¬hedgehog and ¬saved the ⁼earth °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·her with of·¬security there ¬hinds⁺ they·¬met and they·¬saw °the⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ of·one·another⁺

16 to·¬number they·¬passed·by and one of·them not ¬destroyed·himself óther °the ⁼óther not they·¬sought ¬that lord ¬ordered·himself to·them and °the ⁼breath of·him ¬assembled °them

17 and he will·¬put·on to·them °¬lots⁺ and the ⁼hand of·him ¬divided to·self-¬feed to °the ⁼eternity ⁼¬time you⁺·will·¬inherit to °generations⁺ of·generations⁺ they·will·¬give·rest·themselves upon of·her

35 ꜝbe·¬celebrated ¬deserted ⁼thirsting ꜝ¬rejoice·yourself ¬deserted and ꜝlet·¬bloom as °¬lily

2 and will·¬blossom and will·¬rejoice·himself the⁺ ⁼¬deserted⁺ of·the ⁼¬Jordan and the ⁼¬glory of·the Libanou was·given to·her and the ⁼¬honor of·the Karmēlou and the ⁼people of·me will·¬see·himself °the ⁼¬glory of·lord and °the ⁼¬height of·the ⁼God

3 ꜝ¬be·strong⁺ hands⁺ ⁼having·self-¬loosened and °knees⁺ ⁼having·self-¬paralyzed

4 ꜝ¬plead⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬fainthearted⁺ to·the ⁼¬mind ꜝ¬be·strong⁺ ńot you⁺·¬fear·yourselves⁺ ¬¡see! the ⁼God of·us °judgment ¬repays and will·¬repay he will·¬come and will·¬save °us

5 ŧhen they·will·be·¬opened ¬eyes⁺ of·¬blind⁺ and °ear of·¬deaf⁺ they·will·hear·themselves

6 ŧhen will·¬spring as ¬hind ⁼the ⁼¬lame and ¬plainly will·be·himself tongue of·¬hardly·talking⁺ ¬that was·¬thrown·violently in to·the ⁼¬deserted water and ¬valley in to·earth ⁼thirsting

7 and the ⁼¬waterless will·be·himself to °¬marshes⁺ and to °the ⁼thirsting ⁼earth ¬flow of·water will·be·himself there ¬joy of·¬hens⁺ ¬residence of·¬reed and °¬marshes⁺

8 there will·be·himself ¬road ⁼¬clean and ¬road ⁼holy will·be·called and not ńot should·¬pass·by there ¬unclean not·then will·be·himself there ¬road ⁼¬unclean then the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬scattered they·will·¬travel·themselves upon of·her and not ńot they·should·be·¬led·astray

9 and not will·be·himself there lion not·then of·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ not ńot should·¬ascend upon °her not·then ńot should·be·found there but they·will·¬travel·themselves in to·her having·self-¬ransomed

10 and having·self-¬assembled through °lord they·will·be·¬turned·away and they·will·¬come to °¬Zion with of·¬joy and ¬joy eternal ¬above of·head of·them upon for of·head of·them ¬praise and ¬leap·for·joy and ¬joy will·¬grasp·himself °them ¬ran·away ¬anguish and ¬grief and ¬groan

36 and was·generated·himself of·the ⁼four-and-tenth ⁼year of·becoming·king ⁼¬Hezekiah ¬ascended Sennachērim ⁼king Assuriōn upon °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·the ⁼Yudaea °the⁺ ⁼¬fortified⁺ and took °them

2 and missioned·off king Assuriōn Rapsakēn out Lachis to °Yerushalam unto °the ⁼king ⁼¬Hezekiah with of·ability ⁼much and stood in to·the ⁼¬aqueduct of·the ⁼¬pool ⁼the·one ¬above in to·the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼field ⁼the ⁼¬one·who·bleaches

3 and came·out unto °him ¬Eliakim ⁼the·one of·the Chelkiou the ⁼¬manager and Somnas ⁼the ⁼writer and Iōach ⁼the·one of·the Asaf the ⁼¬recorder

4 and told to·them Rapsakēs ꜝtell⁺ to·¬Hezekiah °¬these⁺ says the ⁼king ⁼the ⁼great ⁼king Assuriōn °what having·¬persuaded you·are

5 ńot in to·¬plan or to·sayings⁺ of·lips⁺ ¬battle·array is·generated·himself and now upon to·what you·have·¬persuaded ¬that you·¬disobey to·me

6 ¬¡see! having·¬persuaded you·are upon °the ⁼¬rod ⁼the ⁼¬of·reed ⁼the ⁼¬crushed ⁼this upon °Egypt which iᵮ upon °her should·be·¬strengthened will·come·to·himself to °the ⁼hand of·him thus is Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬persuaded upon to·him

7 if then you⁺·say upon °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us we·have·¬persuaded

8 now ꜝbe·¬mixed⁺ to·the ⁼lord of·me to·the ⁼king Assuriōn and I·will·give to·you⁺ °two·thousand °horse if you⁺·will·be·able·yourselves⁺ to·give °¬riders⁺ upon °them

21 and was·missioned·off ¬Isaiah ⁼son of·¬Amos unto °¬Hezekiah and told to·him °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el I·heard °which⁺ you·¬prayed·yourself unto °me about Sennachērim ⁼king Assuriōn

23 °what you·¬reviled and you·¬provoked or unto °what you·¬lifted·up °the ⁼voice of·you and not you·¬took·up to °¬height °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you to °the ⁼holy of·the ⁼Yisra’el

24 ¬that through of·¬announcers⁺ you·¬reviled °lord you for you·told to·the ⁼¬multitude of·the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ I* I·¬ascended to °¬height of·mountains⁺ and to °the⁺ ⁼¬last⁺ of·the Libanou and I·chopped °the ⁼¬height of·the ⁼¬Kidron of·him and °the ⁼¬beauty of·the ⁼¬cypress and they·came·to to °¬height of·¬part of·the ⁼¬grove

26 not °these⁺ you·heard ¬of·old °which⁺ I* I·did out of·¬ancient⁺ of·days⁺ I·¬directed now then I·¬showed to·¬make·desolate °nations⁺ in to·¬fortified⁺ and °¬dwelling·in in to·cities⁺ ⁼¬fortified⁺

27 I·¬loosened °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ and they·were·dried·up and they·were·generated·themselves as of·¬grass ¬dried·up upon of·¬rooftops⁺ and as ¬wild·grass

28 now then °the ⁼¬rest of·you and °the ⁼¬departure of·you and °the ⁼¬entry of·you I* I·¬know·myself

29 then the ⁼¬wrath of·you °which you·were·¬angered and the ⁼¬bitterness of·you ¬ascended unto °me and I·will·throw·in °¬rein to °the ⁼¬nostril of·you and °¬bridle to °the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·you and I·will·¬turn·away °you to·the ⁼¬road ⁼which you·came in to·her

30 °this then to·you °the ⁼sign ꜝ¬eat °this ⁼the ⁼¬year °which⁺ you·have·seeded then to·the ⁼¬year ⁼the ⁼second °the ⁼¬remnant then to·the ⁼third seeding ꜝ¬mow⁺ and ꜝ¬plant⁺ °vineyards⁺ and you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼fruit of·them

33 through °this thus says lord upon °king Assuriōn not ńot should·come·to to °the ⁼city ⁼this not·then ńot should·throw upon °her °¬arrow not·then ńot should·¬put·on upon °her °¬long·shield not·then ńot should·¬surround upon °her °¬barricade

36 and came·out ¬announcer of·lord and ¬killed out of·the ⁼¬barracks of·the⁺ Assuriōn hundred eighty five °thousands⁺ and ¬raising·up °the·one ¬early they·found °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bodies⁺ ⁼corpse⁺

38 was·generated·himself then in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that was·¬been·infirm ¬Hezekiah ¬until of·death and came unto °him ¬Isaiah ⁼son of·¬Amos the ⁼¬prophet and told unto °him °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬appoint·yourself about of·the ⁼house of·you you·die·off for you and not you·will·live·yourself

2 and ¬turned·away ¬Hezekiah °the ⁼¬face of·him unto °the ⁼wall and ¬prayed·himself unto °lord

3 saying ꜝbe·¬remembered lord as I·was·¬travelled ¬before of·you with of·¬truth in to·heart ⁼¬true and °the⁺ ⁼¬pleasing⁺ ¬before of·you I·did and ¬wept ¬Hezekiah to·¬weeping ⁼great

4 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °¬Isaiah saying

5 ꜝ¬travel·yourself and ꜝtell °¬Hezekiah °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·David ⁼the ⁼father of·you I·heard of·the ⁼voice ⁼the ⁼¬prayer of·you and they·¬saw °the⁺ ⁼¬teardrops⁺ of·you ¬¡see! I·¬add unto °the ⁼¬time of·you °years⁺ ten five

6 and out of·hand of·king Assuriōn I·will·¬save °you and ¬above of·the ⁼city ⁼this I·will·¬shield

7 this then to·you the ⁼sign ¬from of·lord ¬that the ⁼God will·do °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this

8 °the ⁼¬shadow of·the⁺ ⁼¬stairses⁺ °which⁺ ¬came the ⁼sun °the·ones⁺ ten °¬stairses⁺ of·the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼father of·you I·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼sun °the·ones⁺ ten °¬stairses⁺ and ¬ascended the ⁼sun °the·ones⁺ ten °¬stairses⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬came the ⁼¬shadow

9 ⁼¬prayer of·¬Hezekiah ⁼king of·the ⁼Yudaea ¬when was·¬been·infirm and ¬arose out of·the ⁼¬sickness of·him

10 I* I·told in to·the ⁼¬height of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·me in to·gates⁺ of·¬hell I·will·¬leave·behind °the⁺ ⁼years⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺

11 I·told ¬not·any·more ńot I·should·¬see °the ⁼¬saving of·the ⁼God upon of·the ⁼earth ¬not·any·more ńot I·should·¬see °human

12 out of·the ⁼¬kindred of·me they·¬left·behind °the ⁼¬henceforth of·the ⁼life of·me came·out and came·off off myˊ ¬just·as the ⁼¬destroying °¬tent ¬setting·up °the ⁼breath of·me ¬from to·me* was·generated·himself as ¬mast of·¬wool·worker ⁼¬coming·near to·be·going·to·¬cut·off in to·the ⁼day ⁼that I·was·¬delivered

13 ¬until ¬early as to·lion thus °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me ¬broke off for of·the ⁼day ¬until of·the ⁼night I·was·¬delivered

14 as ¬swallow thus I·will·¬call and as dove thus I·will·¬meditate they·¬failed for of·me the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·the·one to·look to °the ⁼¬height of·the ⁼heaven unto °the ⁼lord which ¬took·out °me

15 and ¬removed·himself of·me °the ⁼¬anguish of·the ⁼soul

16 lord about of·her for was·¬announced to·you and you·¬raised of·me °the ⁼breath and ¬pleaded I·lived

17 you·¬chose·yourself for of·me °the ⁼soul so·that ńot should·¬destroy·himself and you·¬threw·off ¬after of·me °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·me

18 not for the·ones⁺ in of·¬hell they·will·¬praise °you not·then the⁺ ⁼dying·off they·will·¬praise °you not·then they·will·¬hope the·ones⁺ in of·¬hell °the ⁼¬charity of·you

19 the⁺ ⁼living they·will·¬praise °you °which ⁼¬way and I* off for of·the·one today °¬children⁺ I·will·do °which⁺ they·will·¬announce °the ⁼justice of·you

20 lord of·the ⁼¬salvation of·me and not I·will·¬cease·myself ¬praising °you with of·¬psaltery °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼life of·me ¬before of·the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼God

21 and told ¬Isaiah unto °¬Hezekiah ꜝtake °¬dried·cluster out of·¬fig·trees⁺ and ꜝ¬be·very·busy and ꜝ¬plaster·yourself and ¬healthy you·will·be·yourself

22 and told ¬Hezekiah °this °the ⁼sign ¬that I·will·¬ascend·myself to °the ⁼house of·lord ⁼the ⁼God

39 in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that missioned·off ¬??? son of·the Laadan the ⁼king of·the ⁼¬Babylon °upon-messages⁺ and °¬ambassadors⁺ and °¬gifts⁺ °¬Hezekiah heard for ¬that was·¬been·infirm ¬until of·death and ¬arose

2 and was·¬rejoiced upon to·them ¬Hezekiah °¬joy ⁼great and ¬showed to·them °the ⁼house of·the ⁼¬spices and of·the ⁼¬balsam and of·the⁺ ⁼¬incenses⁺ and of·the ⁼myrrh and of·the ⁼silver and of·the ⁼gold and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·the ⁼¬treasury and °all °whatever⁺ was in to·the⁺ ⁼treasures⁺ of·him and not was °no·one which not ¬showed ¬Hezekiah in to·the ⁼house of·him

3 and came ¬Isaiah ⁼the ⁼¬prophet unto °the ⁼king ⁼¬Hezekiah and told unto °him ⁼what they·say the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼these⁺ and ¬whence they·¬come unto °you and told ¬Hezekiah out of·earth ¬afar·off they·¬come unto °me out of·¬Babylon

40 ꜝ¬plead⁺ ꜝ¬plead⁺ °the ⁼people of·me says the ⁼God

2 priests⁺ ꜝspeak⁺ to °the ⁼heart ⁼Yerushalam ꜝ¬plead⁺ °her ¬that was·¬filled the ⁼¬lowliness of·her has·¬loosed·himself of·her the ⁼sin ¬that ¬received·himself out of·hand of·lord °¬double⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬sins⁺ of·her

41 ꜝ¬inaugurate⁺·yourselves⁺ unto °me ¬islands⁺ the·ones⁺ for ¬rulers⁺ they·will·¬change °¬strength ꜝlet·them·¬come·near⁺ and ꜝlet·them·speak⁺ ¬together ŧhen °judgment ꜝlet·them·¬announce⁺

2 what ¬raised off of·¬easts⁺ °justice called °her ¬according·to °feet⁺ of·him and will·¬travel·himself will·give ¬in·front·of of·nations⁺ and °kings⁺ will·¬amaze and will·give to °earth °the⁺ ⁼¬swords⁺ of·them and as °¬brushwoods⁺ ⁼self-¬expelling ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬bows⁺ of·them

43 and now thus says lord ⁼the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼doing °you Ya‘aqob the ⁼¬molding °you Yisra’el ńot ꜝ¬fear·yourself ¬that I·¬ransomed·myself °you I·called °you °the ⁼name of·you myˊ you·are you

2 and ifᵮ you·should·¬cross through of·water with of·you I·am and ¬rivers⁺ not they·will·¬engulf °you and ifᵮ you·should·¬pass·through through of·fire not ńot you·should·be·¬burned ¬flame not will·¬burn °you

6 I·will·¬say to·the ⁼north ꜝ¬bring and to·the ⁼¬southwest ńot ꜝ¬prevent ꜝ¬bring °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·me off of·earth ¬afar·off and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·me off of·¬end⁺ of·the ⁼earth

7 °all⁺ whatever⁺ they·have·¬called·themselves to·the ⁼name of·me in for to·the ⁼¬glory of·me I·¬prepared °him and I·¬molded and I·did °him

9 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ they·were·¬assembled ¬together and they·will·be·¬assembled ¬rulers⁺ out of·them what will·¬announce °these⁺ or °the·ones⁺ out of·¬beginning what will·¬announce to·you⁺ ꜝlet·them·¬bring⁺ °the⁺ ⁼witnesses⁺ of·them and ꜝlet·them·be·justified⁺ and ꜝlet·them·tell⁺ °¬true⁺

10 ꜝbe·generated⁺·yourselves⁺ to·me witnesses⁺ and I* witness says lord ⁼the ⁼God and the ⁼¬child °which I·¬selected·myself so·that ꜝknow⁺ and you⁺·should·trust and you⁺·should·¬understand ¬that I* I·am ¬before of·me not was·generated·himself other ⁼God and with °me* not will·be·himself

11 I* the ⁼God and not is ¬besides myˊ ¬saving

12 I·¬announced and I·¬saved I·¬reviled and not was in to·you⁺ ¬another's you⁺ to·me* witnesses⁺ and I* witness says lord ⁼the ⁼God

13 ¬still off of·¬beginning and not is the·one out of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me self-¬taking·out I·will·do and what will·¬turn·away °it

14 thus says lord ⁼the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼self-¬ransoming °you⁺ the ⁼holy of·Yisra’el ¬because·of of·you⁺ I·will·mission·off to °¬Babylon and I·will·¬awaken °all⁺ ⁼¬fleeing and ¬Chaldeans⁺ in to·sailboats⁺ they·will·be·¬bound

15 I* lord ⁼the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼holy of·you⁺ the ⁼¬introducing of·Yisra’el °king of·you⁺

16 thus says lord ⁼the ⁼giving °¬road in to·sea and in to·water ⁼¬strong °¬path

17 the ⁼¬leading·out °¬chariots⁺ and °horse and °¬crowd ⁼¬strong but they·were·¬slept and not they·will·¬arise·themselves they·were·¬extinguished as °linen ⁼having·self-¬extinguished

18 ńot ꜝ¬remember⁺ °the⁺ ⁼first⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬ancient⁺ ńot ꜝ¬discuss⁺·yourselves⁺

19 ¬¡see! I·do °¬new⁺ ⁼which⁺ now will·¬rise and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ °them and I·will·do in to·the ⁼¬deserted °¬road and in to·the ⁼¬waterless °¬rivers⁺

20 will·¬praise °me the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼field ¬sirens⁺ and daughters⁺ of·¬ostriches⁺ ¬that I·gave in to·the ⁼¬deserted °water and °¬rivers⁺ in to·the ⁼¬waterless to·¬water °the ⁼¬gens of·me °the ⁼¬select

21 °people of·me °which I·¬gained·myself °the⁺ ⁼virtues⁺ of·me to·self-¬relate·fully

22 not now I·called °you Ya‘aqob not·then to·¬labor °you I·did Yisra’el

23 not to·me* °sheep⁺ of·the ⁼¬whole·offering of·you not·then in to·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·you you·¬glorified °me not·then °¬wearied I·did °you in to·¬frankincense

24 not·then you·¬possessed·yourself to·me of·silver °¬incense not·then °the ⁼¬fat of·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·you I·¬longed·for but in to·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·you I·¬set·before of·you

25 I* I·am I* I·am the ⁼¬blotting·out °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you and not ńot I·will·be·¬remembered

26 you then ꜝbe·¬remembered and we·should·be·judged ꜝsay you °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you first so·that you·should·be·justified

27 the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ first⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them they·¬acted·lawlessly to °me*

28 and they·¬stained the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·me and I·gave to·¬destroy °Ya‘aqob and °Yisra’el to °¬reproach

44 now then ꜝhear ¬child of·me Ya‘aqob and Yisra’el °which I·¬selected·myself

2 thus says lord ⁼the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼doing °you and the ⁼¬molding °you out of·¬belly ¬still you·will·be·¬helped ńot ꜝ¬fear·yourself ¬child of·me Ya‘aqob and the ⁼having·self-loved ⁼Yisra’el °which I·¬selected·myself

3 ¬that I* I·will·give °water in to·thirst to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬travelling in to·¬waterless I·will·¬put °the ⁼breath of·me upon °the ⁼seed of·you and °the⁺ ⁼¬praises⁺ of·me upon °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you

4 and they·will·¬rise ¬like ¬grass ¬each °¬midst of·water and as ¬willow upon °¬drifting·away ⁼water

5 this will·¬say of·the ⁼God I·am and this will·¬cry·out·himself upon to·the ⁼name of·Ya‘aqob and óther will·¬write·on of·the ⁼God I·am upon to·the ⁼name of·Yisra’el

6 thus says the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼king of·the ⁼Yisra’el the ⁼self-¬rescuing °him God of·tzeba’ot I* first and I* with °these⁺ ¬but myˊ not is God

7 ⁼what ¬just·as I* ꜝlet·stand ꜝlet·call and ꜝlet·¬make·ready to·me off of·which I·did °human to °the ⁼eternity and °the⁺ ⁼self-¬arriving ¬before of·the·one to·come ꜝlet·them·¬announce⁺ to·you⁺

9 the⁺ ⁼¬molding and ¬carving ⁼all⁺ ⁼¬futile⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼doing °the⁺ ⁼¬wishes⁺ of·them °which⁺ not will·¬help °them but they·will·be·¬been·ashamed

14 which chopped °¬wood out of·the ⁼¬grove which ¬planted lord and ¬rain ¬grew

45 thus says lord ⁼the ⁼God to·the ⁼Christ of·me Kurō of·which I·¬grasped of·the ⁼¬right to·¬listen·to ¬before of·him °nations⁺ and °¬strength of·kings⁺ I·will·¬tear I·should·¬open ¬before of·him °¬doors⁺ and cities⁺ not they·will·be·¬confined

2 I* ¬before of·you I·will·¬travel·myself and °mountains⁺ I·will·¬level °¬doors⁺ ⁼copper⁺ I·will·¬break and °¬bars⁺ ⁼irons⁺ I·will·¬break·in·pieces·together

20 ꜝbe·¬assembled⁺ and ꜝ¬come⁺ ꜝ¬plan⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬together the⁺ ⁼¬saved off of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ not they·knew the⁺ ⁼¬taking·up °the ⁼¬wood ⁼¬carving of·them and self-¬praying as unto °Gods⁺ which⁺ not they·¬save

11 and will·¬come upon °you ¬destruction and not ńot you·should·know ¬pit and you·will·¬fall·into·yourself to °him and will·¬come upon °you ¬misery and not ńot you·will·be·able·yourself °¬clean⁺ to·self-be·generated and will·¬come upon °you ¬sudden ¬destruction and not ńot you·should·know
