13 you·have·¬labored in to·the⁺ ⁼¬plans⁺ of·you ꜝlet·them·stand⁺ and ꜝlet·them·¬save⁺ °you the⁺ ⁼¬astrologers⁺ of·the ⁼heaven the⁺ ⁼¬seeing °the⁺ ⁼stars⁺ ꜝlet·them·¬announce⁺ to·you °what ¬ensues upon °you to·self-come

14 ¬¡see! all⁺ as °¬brushwoods⁺ upon to·fire they·will·be·¬burned and not ńot they·should·¬take·out·themselves °the ⁼soul of·them out of·¬flame ¬that you·have °¬charcoals⁺ of·fire to·¬seat upon °them

15 these⁺ they·will·be·themselves to·you ¬help you·¬labored in to·the ⁼¬revolt of·you out of·youth human ¬according·to °himself was·¬led·astray to·you then not will·be·himself ¬salvation

48 ꜝhear⁺ °these⁺ house of·Ya‘aqob the⁺ ⁼having·self-called to·the ⁼name of·Yisra’el and the·ones⁺ out of·Yudah coming·out ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬swearing to·the·one to·name of·lord ⁼God ⁼Yisra’el self-¬remembering not with of·¬truth not·then with of·justice

2 and self-¬clinging·to to·the ⁼name of·the ⁼city ⁼the ⁼holy and upon to·the ⁼God of·the ⁼Yisra’el self-¬supporting lord of·tzeba’ot name to·him

3 °the⁺ ⁼¬before⁺ ¬still I·¬announced and out of·the ⁼mouth of·me came·out and °¬audible was·generated·himself ¬suddenly I·did and ¬arrived

4 I·know I* ¬that ¬hard you·are and ¬nerve ⁼iron the ⁼neck of·you and the ⁼¬forehead of·you copper

5 and I·¬announced to·you ¬of·old ¬before to·come upon °you °¬audible to·you I·did ńot you·should·tell ¬that the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·me they·did and ńot you·should·tell ¬that the⁺ ⁼¬carving⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬casted⁺ ¬ordered·himself to·me

6 you⁺·heard all⁺ and you⁺ not you⁺·knew but and °¬audible⁺ to·you I·did °the⁺ ⁼¬new⁺ off of·the·one now °which⁺ ¬ensues to·self-be·generated and not you·told

7 now is·generated·himself and not ¬of·old and not to·¬before⁺ ⁼days⁺ you·heard °them ńot you·should·tell ¬that ¬yes I·know °them

8 not·also you·knew not·also you·have·¬known not·also off of·¬beginning I·¬opened of·you °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ I·knew for ¬that ¬rejecting you·will·¬reject and ¬lawless ¬still out of·¬belly you·will·be·called

9 ¬because·of of·the·one myˊ of·name I·will·¬show to·you °the ⁼¬wrath of·me and °the⁺ ⁼¬honored⁺ of·me I·will·¬bring·upon upon to·you so·that ńot I·should·¬root·out °you

10 ¬¡see! I·have·¬sold °you not ¬because·of of·silver I·¬took·out·myself then °you out of·¬furnace of·¬poverty

11 ¬because·of myˊ I·should·do to·you ¬that the·one myˊ name is·¬profaned and °the ⁼¬glory of·me to·óther not I·will·give

12 ꜝhear of·me Ya‘aqob and Yisra’el °which I* I·call I* I·am first and I* I·am to °the ⁼eternity

13 and the ⁼hand of·me ¬founded °the ⁼earth and the ⁼¬right of·me ¬strengthened °the ⁼heaven I·will·call °them and they·will·stand·themselves ¬together

14 and they·will·be·¬assembled all⁺ and they·will·hear·themselves what to·them ¬announced °these⁺ loving °you I·did °the ⁼¬will of·you upon °¬Babylon of·the·one to·¬take·up °seed of·¬Chaldeans⁺

15 I* I·spoke I* I·called I·¬brought °him and I·¬got·along·well °the ⁼¬road of·him

16 ꜝ¬bring·near⁺ unto °me and ꜝhear⁺ °these⁺ not off of·¬beginning in ¬in·secret I·spoke not·then in to·¬place of·earth to·¬dark ¬when was·generated·himself there myˊ and now lord has·missioned·off °me and the ⁼breath of·him

17 thus says lord ⁼the ⁼self-¬rescuing °you the ⁼holy of·Yisra’el I* I·am the ⁼God of·you I·have·¬shown to·you of·the·one to·find °you °the ⁼¬road in to·which you·will·¬travel·yourself in to·her

18 and if you·heard of·the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ of·me was·generated·himself iᵮ ¬like ¬river the ⁼peace of·you and the ⁼justice of·you as ¬wave of·sea

19 and was·generated·himself iᵮ as the ⁼¬sand the ⁼seed of·you and the⁺ ⁼¬descendant⁺ of·the ⁼¬belly of·you as the ⁼¬dust of·the ⁼earth not·then now not ńot you·should·be·¬rooted·out not·then will·¬destroy·himself the ⁼name of·you ¬before of·me

20 ꜝcome·out out of·¬Babylon ¬fleeing off of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ °voice of·¬joy ꜝ¬announce⁺ and °¬audible ꜝlet·be·generated·himself °this ꜝ¬announce⁺ ¬until of·¬last of·the ⁼earth ꜝsay⁺ ¬rescued·himself lord °the ⁼servant of·him °Ya‘aqob

21 and ifᵮ they·should·thirst through of·¬deserted will·¬bring °them °water out of·rock will·¬lead·out to·them will·be·¬split °rock and will·¬flow·himself water and will·drink·himself the ⁼people of·me

22 not is to·¬rejoice to·the⁺ ⁼¬ungodly⁺ says lord

49 ꜝhear⁺ of·me ¬islands⁺ and ꜝ¬watch·out⁺ nations⁺ through of·¬time ⁼much will·stand·himself says lord out of·¬belly ⁼mother of·me called °the ⁼name of·me

2 and ¬placed °the ⁼mouth of·me ¬like °¬sword ⁼¬sharp and ¬by °the ⁼¬shelter of·the ⁼hand of·him ¬hid °me ¬placed °me as °¬arrow ⁼¬select and in to·the ⁼¬quiver of·him ¬sheltered °me

3 and told to·me servant of·me you·are you Yisra’el and in to·you I·will·be·¬glorified

4 and I* I·told ¬vainly I·¬labored and to °¬futile and to °no·one I·gave °the ⁼¬strength of·me through °this the ⁼judgment of·me ¬from to·lord and the ⁼¬travail of·me ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼God of·me

5 and now thus says lord ⁼the ⁼¬molding °me out of·¬belly °servant to·himself of·the·one to·¬assemble °the ⁼Ya‘aqob and °Yisra’el unto °him I·will·be·¬assembled and I·will·be·¬glorified ¬in·front·of of·lord and the ⁼God of·me will·be·himself of·me ¬strength

6 and told to·me great to·you is of·the·one to·be·called °you °¬child of·me of·the·one to·stand °the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·Ya‘aqob and °the ⁼¬dispersion of·the ⁼Yisra’el to·¬turn ¬¡see! I·have·¬placed °you to °¬covenant of·¬gens to °light of·nations⁺ of·the·one to·be °you to °¬salvation ¬until of·¬last of·the ⁼earth

7 thus says lord ⁼the ⁼self-¬rescuing °you the ⁼God of·Yisra’el ꜝmake·holy⁺ °the ⁼¬treating·as·worthless °the ⁼soul of·him °the ⁼¬abhorred ¬by of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ kings⁺ they·will·¬see·themselves °him and they·will·¬arise·themselves ¬rulers⁺ and they·will·¬worship to·him ¬because·of of·lord ¬that ¬faithful is the ⁼holy of·Yisra’el and I·¬selected·myself °you

8 thus says lord to·¬time ⁼¬acceptable I·¬listened·to of·you and in to·day of·¬salvation I·¬helped to·you and I·gave °you to °¬covenant of·nations⁺ of·the·one to·¬appoint °the ⁼earth and to·¬inherit °¬inheritance of·¬deserted

9 °saying to·the·ones⁺ in to·¬chains⁺ ꜝcome·out⁺ and to·the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼¬darkness to·be·¬unveiled and in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them they·will·be·¬feeded and in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬paths⁺ the ⁼¬pasture of·them

10 not they·will·hunger not·then they·will·thirst not·then will·¬strike °them ¬heat not·then the ⁼sun but the·one of·mercies⁺ °them will·¬plead and through of·¬flows⁺ of·waters⁺ will·¬bring °them

11 and I·will·¬place °all ⁼mountain to °¬road and °all ⁼¬path to °¬pastured to·them

12 ¬¡see! these⁺ ¬afar·off they·come·themselves these⁺ off of·north and these⁺ off of·sea others⁺ then out of·earth Persōn

13 ꜝ¬celebrate⁺·yourselves⁺ heavens⁺ and ꜝlet·¬rejoice·himself the ⁼earth ꜝlet·them·¬throw·violently⁺ the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ °¬joy and the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ °justice ¬that ¬had·mercy the ⁼God °the ⁼people of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬lowly⁺ of·the ⁼people of·him ¬pleaded

14 told then ¬Zion ¬left·behind °me lord and the ⁼lord ¬forgot·himself of·me

15 ńot will·¬forget·himself woman of·the ⁼¬child of·her of·the·one ńot to·¬have·mercy °the⁺ ⁼¬descendant⁺ of·the ⁼¬belly of·her if then and may·¬forget·himself °these⁺ woman but I* not I·will·¬forget·myself of·you told lord

16 ¬¡see! upon of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me I·¬portrayed of·you °the⁺ ⁼walls⁺ and ¬before of·me you·are through of·all

17 and ¬quickly you·will·be·¬built ¬by of·which⁺ you·were·¬taken·down and the⁺ ⁼¬laying·waste °you out of·you they·will·come·out·themselves

18 ꜝ¬take·up ¬surrounding °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you and ꜝ¬see °all⁺ ¬¡see! they·were·¬assembled and they·came unto °you I·live I* says lord ¬that °all⁺ °them you·will·¬put·on·yourself and you·will·¬put·on·yourself °them as °cosmos of·bride

19 ¬that the⁺ ⁼¬deserted⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬destroyed and the⁺ ⁼having·¬collapsed now will·¬press·upon off of·the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling and they·will·be·¬prolonged off of·you the⁺ ⁼¬swallowing °you

20 they·will·¬say for to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·you the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you °which⁺ you·have·¬destroyed ¬narrow to·me the ⁼¬place ꜝdo to·me °¬place so·that I·will·¬dwell

21 and you·will·¬say in to·the ⁼heart of·you what engendered to·me °these⁺ I* then ¬childless and widow °these⁺ then what ¬nourished to·me I* then I·was·¬left·behind ¬alone these⁺ then to·me ¬where? they·were

22 thus says lord ¬¡see! I·¬take·up to °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ °the ⁼hand of·me and to °the⁺ ⁼¬islands⁺ I·will·¬take·up °¬agreed·signal of·me and they·will·¬bring °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you in to·¬bosom then °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you upon of·shoulders⁺ they·will·¬take·up

23 and they·will·be·themselves kings⁺ ⁼¬wet-nurse⁺ of·you then the⁺ ⁼¬·first ⁼¬nursing·mothers⁺ of·you upon °¬face of·the ⁼earth they·will·¬worship to·you and °the ⁼¬dust of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·you they·will·¬lick and you·will·know·yourself ¬that I* lord and not you·will·be·¬been·ashamed

24 ńot will·take·himself whatever ¬from of·¬giant °¬plunders⁺ and ifᵮ should·¬take·captive whatever ¬unjustly will·be·¬saved

25 thus says lord ifᵮ whatever should·¬take·captive °¬giant will·take·himself °¬plunders⁺ taking then ¬from of·¬·strong will·be·¬saved I* then °the ⁼judgment of·you I·will·judge and I* °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you I·will·¬rescue·myself

26 and they·will·¬eat·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °you °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·them and they·will·drink·themselves as °wine ⁼young °the ⁼blood of·them and they·will·be·¬gotten·drunk and will·be·¬perceived all ⁼flesh ¬that I* lord ⁼the ⁼self-¬rescuing °you and self-¬helping of·¬strength of·Ya‘aqob

50 thus says lord ¬what? ⁼the ⁼¬scroll of·the ⁼¬divorce of·the ⁼mother of·you⁺ to·which I·¬sended·out °her or to·what ⁼¬debtor I·have·¬sold °you⁺ ¬¡see! to·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you⁺ you⁺·were·¬sold and to·the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·you⁺ I·¬sended·out °the ⁼mother of·you⁺

2 °what ¬that I·came and not was human I·called and not was the ⁼¬obeying ńot not ¬is·strong the ⁼hand of·me of·the·one to·self-¬rescue or not I·¬am·strong of·the·one to·self-¬take·out ¬¡see! to·the ⁼¬threat of·me I·will·¬make·desolate °the ⁼sea and I·will·¬place °¬rivers⁺ ⁼¬deserted⁺ and they·will·be·dried·up the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·them off of·the·one ńot to·be °water and they·will·die·off·themselves in to·thirst

3 and I·will·¬put·on °the ⁼heaven ⁼¬darkness and I·will·¬place as °¬sackcloth °the ⁼¬covering of·him

4 lord gives to·me °tongue of·¬discipline of·the·one to·know in to·¬time ¬when ¬is·necessary to·tell °saying ¬placed to·me ¬early ¬added to·me °ear to·hear

5 and the ⁼¬discipline of·lord ¬opens of·me °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ I* then not I·¬disobey not·then I·¬dispute

6 °the ⁼¬back of·me I·have·given to °whips⁺ then ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬cheeks⁺ of·me to °¬slaps⁺ then °the ⁼¬face of·me not I·¬turned·away off of·¬shame of·¬spits⁺

7 and lord ⁼¬helper of·me was·been·generated through °this not I·was·¬caused·shame but I·¬placed °the ⁼¬face of·me as °¬strong ⁼rock and I·knew ¬that not ńot I·should·be·¬been·ashamed

8 ¬that ¬comes·near the ⁼justifying °me what ⁼the ⁼self-judging to·me ꜝlet·¬oppose to·me ¬together and what ⁼the ⁼self-judging to·me ꜝlet·¬come·near to·me

9 ¬¡see! lord ¬helps to·me what will·do·evil °me ¬¡see! all⁺ you⁺ as °cloak you⁺·will·be·¬getted·old and as ¬moth will·¬devour·himself °you⁺

10 what in to·you⁺ the ⁼self-¬fearing °the ⁼lord ꜝlet·hear of·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬child of·him the⁺ ⁼self-¬travelling in to·¬darkness not is to·them light you⁺·have·¬persuaded upon to·the ⁼name of·lord and ꜝ¬support⁺·yourselves⁺ upon to·the ⁼God

11 ¬¡see! all⁺ you⁺ °fire you⁺·¬kindle and you⁺·¬prevail °¬flame you⁺·¬travel·yourselves⁺ to·the ⁼light of·the ⁼fire of·you⁺ and to·the ⁼¬flame ⁼which you⁺·¬were·enflamed through °me* was·generated·himself °these⁺ to·you⁺ in to·¬grief you⁺·will·be·¬slept

51 ꜝhear⁺ of·me the⁺ ⁼¬pursuing °the·one °just and ¬seeking °the ⁼lord ꜝ¬look·into⁺ to °the ⁼¬strong ⁼rock ⁼which you⁺·¬hewed and to °the ⁼¬pit of·the ⁼¬pit °which you⁺·¬dug

2 ꜝ¬look·into⁺ to °Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·you⁺ and to °¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼¬·in·labor °you⁺ ¬that one was and I·called °him and I·¬praised °him and I·loved °him and I·¬multiplied °him

3 and °you now I·will·¬plead °¬Zion and I·¬pleaded °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬deserted⁺ of·her and I·will·¬place °the⁺ ⁼¬deserted⁺ of·her as °¬paradise of·lord °¬joy and °¬leap·for·joy they·will·find in to·her °¬acknowledgment and °voice of·¬praise

4 ꜝhear⁺ of·me ꜝhear⁺ people of·me and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ unto °me ꜝ¬listen·to⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬that law ¬from myˊ will·come·out·himself and the ⁼judgment of·me to °light of·nations⁺

5 ¬comes·near ¬quickly the ⁼justice of·me and will·come·out·himself as °light the ⁼¬saving of·me and to °the ⁼arm of·me nations⁺ they·will·¬hope °me* ¬islands⁺ they·will·¬remain and to °the ⁼arm of·me they·will·¬hope

6 ꜝ¬take·up⁺ to °the ⁼heaven °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬look·into⁺ to °the ⁼earth ¬under ¬that the ⁼heaven as ¬smoke was·¬strengthened then the ⁼earth as °cloak will·be·¬getted·old then the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °the ⁼earth ¬just·as °these⁺ they·will·die·off·themselves then the ⁼¬saving of·me to °the ⁼eternity will·be·himself then the ⁼justice of·me not ńot should·¬fail

7 ꜝhear⁺ of·me the⁺ ⁼¬seeing °judgment people of·me of·which the ⁼law of·me in to·the ⁼heart of·you⁺ ńot you⁺·¬fear·yourselves⁺ °¬reproach of·humans⁺ and to·the ⁼¬disparagement of·them ńot ꜝ¬be·lesser⁺·yourselves⁺

8 ¬just·as for cloak will·be·¬eaten ¬by of·¬time and as ¬wools⁺ will·be·¬eaten ¬by of·¬moth then the ⁼justice of·me to °the ⁼eternity will·be·himself then the ⁼¬saving of·me to °generations⁺ of·generations⁺

9 ꜝ¬raise·yourself ꜝ¬raise·yourself Yerushalam and ꜝ¬put·on·yourself °the ⁼¬strength of·the ⁼arm of·you ꜝ¬raise·yourself as in to·¬beginning of·day as generation of·eternity not you you·are

10 the ⁼¬laying·waste °sea °water of·abyss °¬multitude the ⁼¬placing °the⁺ ⁼¬depths⁺ of·the ⁼sea °¬road of·¬ford to·self-¬rescuing

11 and to·having·self-¬ransomed ¬by for of·lord they·will·be·¬turned·away and they·will·¬come to °¬Zion with of·¬joy and of·¬leap·for·joy of·eternal upon for of·the ⁼head of·them ¬joy and ¬praise and ¬joy will·¬grasp·himself °them ¬ran·away ¬anguish and ¬grief and ¬groan

12 I* I·am I* I·am the ⁼¬pleading °you ꜝknow °what ¬revered you·were·¬feared off of·human ⁼¬mortal and off of·son ⁼human which⁺ ¬like °¬grass they·were·dried·up

13 and you·¬forgot·yourself °God ⁼the ⁼doing °you °the ⁼doing ⁼the ⁼heaven and °¬founding °the ⁼earth and you·¬feared·yourself eternally °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ °the ⁼¬face of·the ⁼¬wrath ⁼the ⁼¬pressing·on °you °which ⁼¬way for ¬planed·himself of·the·one to·¬take·up °you and now ¬where? the ⁼¬wrath of·the ⁼¬pressing·on °you

14 in for to·the·one to·self-¬save °you not will·stand·himself not·then will·¬delay

15 ¬that I* the ⁼God of·you the ⁼¬troubling °the ⁼sea and ¬resounding °the⁺ ⁼¬waves⁺ of·her lord of·tzeba’ot name to·me

16 I·will·¬place °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me to °the ⁼mouth of·you and ¬by °the ⁼¬shadow of·the ⁼hand of·me I·will·¬shelter °you in to·which I·stood °the ⁼heaven and I·¬founded °the ⁼earth and will·¬say to·¬Zion people of·me you·are you

17 ꜝ¬raise·yourself ꜝ¬raise·yourself ꜝ¬arise Yerushalam ⁼the ⁼drinking °the ⁼¬cup of·the ⁼¬wrath out of·hand of·lord °the ⁼¬cup for of·the ⁼¬fall °the ⁼¬drinking·cup of·the ⁼¬wrath you·¬drank·up and you·¬emptied·out

18 and not was the ⁼¬pleading °you off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you of·which⁺ you·¬gave·birth·to and not was the ⁼self-¬helping of·the ⁼hand of·you not·then off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you of·which⁺ you·¬lifted·up

19 two these⁺ ⁼self-¬·an·opponent to·you what to·you will·be·¬been·grieved ¬corpse and ¬ruin ¬famine and ¬sword what °you will·¬plead

20 the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you the⁺ ⁼self-¬·perplexed ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬sleeping upon of·¬end of·all ⁼¬departure as °¬beet ⁼¬half-boiled the⁺ ⁼¬full⁺ of·¬wrath ⁼lord having·self-¬fainted through of·lord ⁼the ⁼God

21 through °this ꜝhear having·self-¬humbled and ¬getting·drunk not off of·wine

22 thus says lord ⁼the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼judging °the ⁼people of·him ¬¡see! I·have·taken out of·the ⁼hand of·you °the ⁼¬cup of·the ⁼¬fall °the ⁼¬drinking·cup of·the ⁼¬wrath and not you·will·¬add·yourself ¬still to·drink °it

23 and I·will·throw·in °it to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬harming °you and of·the⁺ ⁼¬humbling °you which⁺ they·told to·the ⁼soul of·you ꜝ¬stoop so·that we·should·¬pass·by and you·¬placed °¬equal⁺ to·the ⁼earth °the⁺ ⁼¬upper·backs⁺ of·you out to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬passing·by

52 ꜝ¬raise·yourself ꜝ¬raise·yourself ¬Zion ꜝ¬put·on·yourself °the ⁼¬strength of·you ¬Zion and ꜝ¬put·on·yourself °the ⁼¬glory of·you Yerushalam ⁼city ⁼the·one °holy⁺ ¬not·any·more will·be·¬added to·¬pass·through through of·you ¬uncircumcised and ¬unclean

2 ꜝ¬shake·out·yourself °the ⁼¬dust and ꜝ¬arise ꜝ¬seat Yerushalam ꜝ¬strip·yourself °the ⁼¬chain of·the ⁼neck of·you the ⁼¬captive ⁼daughter of·¬Zion

3 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord °¬free·gift you⁺·were·¬sold and not with of·silver you⁺·will·be·¬ransomed

4 thus says lord to °Egypt ¬came the ⁼people of·me °the ⁼¬before to·¬be·a·stranger there and to Assurious to·¬force they·were·¬brought

5 and now °what ¬here you⁺·are °¬these⁺ says lord ¬that was·taken the ⁼people of·me ¬freely ꜝ¬marvel⁺ and ꜝ¬wail⁺ °¬these⁺ says lord through °you⁺ through of·all °the ⁼name of·me is·¬blasphemed in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

6 through °this will·know·himself the ⁼people of·me °the ⁼name of·me in to·the ⁼day ⁼that ¬that I* I·am he ⁼the ⁼speaking I·¬am·present

7 as hour upon of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ as feet⁺ of·self-¬announcing °hearsay of·peace as self-¬announcing °good⁺ ¬that °¬audible I·will·do °the ⁼¬salvation of·you saying ¬Zion will·become·king of·you the ⁼God

8 ¬that voice of·the⁺ ⁼¬keeping °you was·¬lifted·up and to·the ⁼voice ¬together they·will·be·¬celebrated ¬that ¬eyes⁺ unto °¬eyes⁺ they·will·¬see·themselves ¬when iᵮ should·¬have·mercy lord °the ⁼¬Zion

9 ꜝlet·¬throw·violently °¬joy ¬together the⁺ ⁼¬deserted⁺ of·Yerushalam ¬that ¬had·mercy lord °her and ¬rescued·himself °Yerushalam

10 and will·¬reveal lord °the ⁼arm of·him °the ⁼holy ¬before of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and they·will·¬see·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬toe⁺ of·the ⁼earth °the ⁼¬salvation ⁼the·one ¬from of·the ⁼God

11 ꜝ¬leave⁺ ꜝ¬leave⁺ ꜝcome·out⁺ ¬from·there and of·¬unclean ńot ꜝtouch⁺·yourselves⁺ ꜝcome·out⁺ out of·¬midst of·her ꜝbe·¬separated⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬bearing °the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·lord

12 ¬that not with of·¬disturbance you⁺·will·come·out·yourselves⁺ not·then to·¬flight you⁺·will·¬travel·yourselves⁺ will·¬travel·himself for ¬before of·you⁺ lord and the ⁼¬gathering °you⁺ lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el

13 ¬¡see! will·¬understand the ⁼¬child of·me and will·be·¬lifted·up and will·be·¬glorified ¬very

14 °which ⁼¬way they·will·¬amaze·themselves upon °you many⁺ thus will·¬be·despised off of·humans⁺ the ⁼¬appearance of·you and the ⁼¬glory of·you off of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺

15 thus they·will·¬marvel·themselves nations⁺ ⁼many⁺ upon to·him and they·will·¬hold kings⁺ °the ⁼mouth of·them ¬that to·which⁺ not was·¬announced about of·him they·will·¬see·themselves and which⁺ not they·have·heard they·will·¬understand

53 lord what trusted to·the ⁼hearsay of·us and the ⁼arm of·lord to·what was·¬revealed

2 we·¬announced ¬in·front·of of·him as ¬child as root in to·earth ⁼thirsting not is ¬appearance to·him not·then ¬glory and we·¬saw °him and not had °¬appearance not·then °¬beauty

3 but the ⁼¬appearance of·him ¬dishonored ¬failing ¬from °all⁺ ⁼humans⁺ human in to·¬plague being and ¬seeing to·¬bear °¬sickness ¬that has·¬turned·away·himself °the ⁼¬face of·him was·¬dishonored and not was·¬counted

4 this °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us ¬bears and about of·us is·¬been·anguished and we we·¬counted·ourselves °him to·be in to·¬travail and in to·¬plague and in to·¬oppression

5 he then was·traumatized through °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·us and is·¬been·infirm through °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us ¬discipline of·peace of·us upon °him to·the ⁼¬wound of·him we we·were·¬healed

6 all⁺ as sheep⁺ we·were·¬led·astray human to·the ⁼¬road of·him was·¬led·astray and lord ¬delivered °him to·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us

7 and he through °the·one to·have·been·done·evil not ¬opens °the ⁼mouth as sheep upon °¬slaughter was·¬brought and as ¬lamb ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼¬shearing °him ¬mute thus not ¬opens °the ⁼mouth of·him

8 in to·the ⁼¬lowliness the ⁼judgment of·him was·¬taken·up °the ⁼generation of·him what will·¬relate·fully·himself ¬that ¬takes·up·himself off of·the ⁼earth the ⁼life of·him off of·the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·the ⁼people of·me was·¬brought to °death

9 and I·will·give °the⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ anti of·the ⁼¬burial of·him and °the⁺ ⁼rich⁺ anti of·the ⁼death of·him ¬that °¬lawlessness not did not·then was·found ¬deceit in to·the ⁼mouth of·him

10 and lord ¬plans·himself to·¬clean °him of·the ⁼¬plague ifᵮ you⁺·should·give about of·sin the ⁼soul of·you⁺ will·¬see·himself °seed ⁼¬long-lived and ¬plans·himself lord to·¬remove

11 off of·the ⁼¬travail of·the ⁼soul of·him to·¬show to·him °light and to·¬mold to·the ⁼¬understanding to·justify °just ¬well °serving to·many⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them he will·¬carry·up

12 through °this he will·¬inherit °many⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼¬strong⁺ will·¬divide °¬plunders⁺ anti of·which⁺ was·¬delivered to °death the ⁼soul of·him and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬lawless⁺ was·¬counted and he °sins⁺ of·many⁺ ¬carried·up and through °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them was·¬delivered

54 ꜝbe·¬celebrated ¬barren ⁼the·one not ¬giving·birth·to ꜝ¬throw·violently and ꜝ¬cry·out the·one not ¬·in·labor ¬that many⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·the ⁼¬deserted ¬more or of·the ⁼having °the ⁼man told for lord

2 ꜝ¬widen °the ⁼¬place of·the ⁼¬tent of·you and of·the⁺ ⁼¬curtains⁺ of·you ꜝ¬set·up ńot you·should·¬spare·yourself ꜝ¬prolong °the⁺ ⁼¬measured·out·lines⁺ of·you and °the⁺ ⁼¬pegs⁺ of·you ꜝ¬prevail

3 ¬still to °the⁺ ⁼¬right⁺ and to °the⁺ ⁼¬left⁺ ꜝ¬extend and the ⁼seed of·you °nations⁺ will·¬inherit and °cities⁺ ⁼self-¬laying·waste you·will·¬dwell

4 ńot ꜝ¬fear·yourself ¬that you·were·¬dishonored ńot·then you·should·¬cause·shame ¬that you·were·¬reviled ¬that °¬shame ⁼eternal you·will·¬forget·yourself and °¬disgrace of·the ⁼widowhood of·you not ńot you·will·be·¬remembered

5 ¬that lord ⁼the ⁼doing °you lord of·tzeba’ot name to·him and the ⁼self-¬rescuing °you he ⁼God of·Yisra’el to·all ⁼the ⁼earth will·be·called

6 not as °woman ⁼having·self-¬left·behind and °¬fainthearted has·called °you lord not·then as °woman out of·youth °having·self-¬hated told the ⁼God of·you

7 °¬time ⁼¬small I·¬left·behind °you and with °mercies⁺ of·great I·will·¬have·mercy °you

8 in to·¬wrath ⁼¬small I·¬turned·away °the ⁼¬face of·me off of·you and in to·mercy ⁼eternal I·will·¬have·mercy °you told the ⁼¬rescuing °you lord

9 off of·the ⁼water ⁼the·one upon °¬Noah this to·me is ¬as I·¬swore to·him in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that to·the ⁼earth ńot to·be·going·to·be·¬angered upon to·you ¬still ńot·then in should·¬threaten of·you

10 °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ to·be·going·to·self-¬move not·then the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ of·you they·will·be·¬shifted thus not·then the·one ¬from myˊ to·you mercy will·¬fail not·then the ⁼¬covenant of·the ⁼peace of·you not ńot should·¬move told for lord ⁼¬propitious to·you

11 ¬lowly and ¬restless not you·were·¬pleaded ¬¡see! I* I·¬make·ready to·you °¬charcoal ⁼the ⁼stone of·you and °the⁺ ⁼¬foundations⁺ of·you °sapphire

12 and I·will·¬place °the⁺ ⁼¬parapets⁺ of·you °jasper and °the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·you °stones⁺ of·crystal and °the ⁼¬enclosure of·you °stones⁺ ⁼¬select⁺

13 and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you °¬taught⁺ of·God and in to·much ⁼peace °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you

14 and in to·justice you·will·be·¬built ꜝ¬cling·to·yourself off of·¬unjust and not you·will·be·¬feared and ¬trembling not will·¬come·near to·you

15 ¬¡see! ¬proselytes⁺ they·will·come·unto·themselves to·you through myˊ and upon °you they·will·¬flee·themselves

16 ¬¡see! I* I·¬create °you not as ¬coppersmith ⁼¬blowing °¬charcoals⁺ and ¬bringing °¬vessel to °work I* then I·¬created °you not to °¬destruction to·¬destroy

17 °all ⁼¬vessel ⁼¬perishable upon °you not I·will·¬get·along·well and all ⁼voice will·¬arise·himself upon °you to °judgment °all⁺ °them you·will·¬be·lesser then the⁺ ⁼¬liable·for⁺ of·you they·will·be·themselves in to·her is ¬inheritance to·the·ones⁺ they·¬serve °lord and you⁺ you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·me just⁺ says lord

55 the⁺ ⁼thirsting you⁺·¬travel·yourselves⁺ upon °water and whatever⁺ ńot you⁺·have °silver ¬proceeding ꜝ¬buy⁺ and ꜝdrink⁺ ¬without of·silver and of·¬honor of·wine and °¬fat

2 so·that °what you⁺·¬honor·yourselves⁺ of·silver and °the ⁼¬toil of·you⁺ not to °¬gratification ꜝhear⁺ of·me and you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °good⁺ and will·¬revel in to·good⁺ the ⁼soul of·you⁺

3 ꜝ¬watch·out⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬follow·after⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·me ꜝ¬listen·to⁺ of·me and will·live·himself in to·good⁺ the ⁼soul of·you⁺ and I·will·¬make·a·covenant·myself to·you⁺ °¬covenant ⁼eternal °the⁺ ⁼¬sacred⁺ of·David °the⁺ ⁼¬faithful⁺

4 ¬¡see! °witness in to·nations⁺ I·have·given °him ⁼¬ruler and °¬ordering to·nations⁺

5 nations⁺ ⁼which⁺ not they·¬saw °you they·will·¬call·themselves °you and peoples⁺ ⁼which⁺ not they·¬know·themselves °you upon °you they·will·¬flee·themselves ¬because·of of·the ⁼God of·you of·the ⁼holy ⁼Yisra’el ¬that ¬glorified °you

6 ꜝ¬seek⁺ °the ⁼God and in to·the·one to·find °him ꜝ¬call⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬when then iᵮ should·¬come·near to·you⁺

7 ꜝlet·¬leave the ⁼¬ungodly °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·him and man ⁼¬lawless °the⁺ ⁼¬plans⁺ of·him and ꜝlet·be·¬turned upon °lord and will·be·¬had·mercy ¬that upon °much will·¬release °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you⁺

8 not for they·are the⁺ ⁼¬plans⁺ of·me ¬just·as the⁺ ⁼¬plans⁺ of·you⁺ not·then ¬just·as the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·me says lord

9 but as ¬has·in·full the ⁼heaven off of·the ⁼earth thus ¬has·in·full the ⁼¬road of·me off of·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·you⁺ off of·the ⁼¬mind of·me

10 as for ifᵮ should·¬come ¬rain or ¬snow out of·the ⁼heaven and not ńot should·be·¬turned·away ¬until iᵮ should·¬get·drunk °the ⁼earth and should·¬bring·forth and should·¬sprout·forth and should·give °seed to·the ⁼seeding and °bread to °¬eating

11 thus will·be·himself the ⁼¬declaration of·me which ifᵮ should·come·out out of·the ⁼mouth of·me not ńot should·be·¬turned·away ¬until iᵮ should·be·¬completed °whatever⁺ I·¬willed and I·will·¬get·along·well °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you and °the⁺ ⁼¬precepts⁺ of·me

12 in for to·¬joy you⁺·will·come·out·yourselves⁺ and in to·¬joy you⁺·will·be·¬taught the·ones⁺ for mountains⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ they·will·¬leap·up·themselves self-¬waiting·for °you⁺ in to·¬joy and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬woods⁺ of·the ⁼field will·¬clap to·the⁺ ⁼¬branches⁺

13 and anti of·the ⁼¬pile will·¬ascend·himself ¬cypress anti then of·the ⁼¬briar will·¬ascend·himself ¬myrtle·tree and will·be·himself lord to °name and to °sign ⁼eternal and not will·¬fail

56 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬keep⁺·yourselves⁺ °judgment ꜝdo⁺ °justice ¬came·near for °the ⁼¬saving of·me to·self-¬come and °the ⁼mercy of·me to·be·¬revealed

2 blessed ⁼man ⁼the ⁼doing °these⁺ and human ⁼the ⁼self-¬clinging·to of·them and ¬keeping °the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ ńot to·¬profane and ¬keeping °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him ńot to·do °¬crime

3 ńot ꜝlet·say the ⁼¬foreign ⁼the ⁼self-¬joining·up·with unto °lord will·¬separate °me ¬therefore lord off of·the ⁼people of·him and ńot ꜝlet·say the ⁼eunuch ¬that I* I·am ¬wood ⁼¬dried·up

4 °¬these⁺ says lord to·the⁺ ⁼eunuchs⁺ whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·¬keep·themselves °the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ of·me and they·should·¬select·themselves °which⁺ I* I·¬will and they·should·¬cling·to·themselves of·the ⁼¬covenant of·me

5 I·will·give to·them in to·the ⁼house of·me and in to·the ⁼wall of·me °¬place ⁼¬famous ⁼¬stronger of·sons⁺ and of·daughters⁺ °name ⁼eternal I·will·give to·them and not will·¬fail

6 and to·the⁺ ⁼¬foreign⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬joining·up·with to·lord to·serve to·him and to·love °the ⁼name of·lord of·the·one to·be to·him to °servants⁺ and °servants⁺ and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬keeping °the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ of·me ńot to·¬profane and °self-¬clinging·to of·the ⁼¬covenant of·me

9 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼of·the·field⁺ ¬come ꜝ¬eat⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼¬grove

10 ꜝ¬see⁺ ¬that all⁺ they·have·been·¬made·blind not they·knew to·¬reason all⁺ ⁼dogs⁺ ⁼¬speechless⁺ not they·will·be·able·themselves to·¬bark self-¬dreaming °¬bed ¬befriending to·¬doze

57 ꜝ¬see⁺ as the ⁼just ¬destroyed·himself and no·one ¬waits·for·himself to·the ⁼heart and men⁺ ⁼just⁺ they·are·¬taken·up and no·one ¬observes off for of·¬face of·¬unrighteousness has·been·¬taken·up the ⁼just

2 will·be·himself in to·peace the ⁼¬burial of·him has·been·¬taken·up out of·the ⁼¬midst

3 you⁺ then ꜝ¬bring·near⁺ ¬here sons⁺ ⁼¬lawless⁺ seed of·adulterers⁺ and of·fornicator

4 in to·what you⁺·¬revelled and upon °what you⁺·¬opened °the ⁼mouth of·you⁺ and upon °what you⁺·¬lowered °the ⁼tongue of·you⁺ not you⁺ you⁺·are ¬children⁺ of·¬destruction seed ¬lawless

5 the⁺ ⁼¬pleading upon °the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ ¬by °trees⁺ ⁼¬bushy⁺ ¬slaughtering °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·them in to·the⁺ ⁼¬valleys⁺ ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼rocks⁺

6 that of·you the ⁼¬part this of·you the ⁼¬lot and to·those⁺ you·¬poured·out °¬libations⁺ and to·those⁺ you·¬carried·up °¬sacrifices⁺ upon to·these⁺ therefore not I·will·be·¬angered

10 to·the⁺ ⁼¬many·wayses⁺ of·you you·¬labored and not you·told I·will·¬cease·myself ¬strengthening ¬that you·¬did °these⁺ through °this not you·were·¬bandaged of·me

11 you °what ¬revered you·were·¬feared and you·lay·yourself °me and not you·were·¬remembered of·me not·then you·took °me to °the ⁼¬mind not·then to °the ⁼heart of·you and I* °you ¬seeing I·¬overlook and °me* not you·were·¬feared

13 ¬when you·should·¬cry·out ꜝlet·them·¬take·out⁺·themselves °you in to·the ⁼¬pressure of·you °these⁺ for °all⁺ ¬wind will·take·himself and will·¬carry·off ¬blast then the⁺ ⁼self-¬clinging·to of·me they·will·¬possess·themselves °earth and they·will·¬inherit °the ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼holy of·me

15 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼¬Highest ⁼the·one in to·¬high⁺ ¬dwelling °the ⁼eternity holy in to·holy⁺ name to·him lord ⁼¬Highest in to·holy⁺ self-¬giving·rest and to·¬fainthearteds⁺ giving °¬patience and giving °life to·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬broken °the ⁼heart

16 not to °the ⁼eternity I·will·¬avenge °you⁺ not·then through of·all I·will·be·¬angered to·you⁺ breath for ¬from myˊ will·come·out·himself and °breath ⁼all I* I·did

17 through °sin °¬little ⁼whatever I·¬grieved °him and I·¬struck °him and I·¬turned·away °the ⁼¬face of·me off of·him and was·¬grieved and was·¬travelled ¬gloomy in to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·him

18 °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·him I·have·¬seen and I·¬healed·myself °him and I·¬pleaded °him and I·gave to·him °¬encouragement ⁼¬true

19 ⁼peace upon °peace to·the·ones⁺ ¬far and to·the·ones⁺ ¬near to·being and told lord I·will·¬heal·myself °them

20 then the⁺ ⁼¬unjust⁺ thus they·will·be·¬tossed and to·self-¬give·rest not they·will·be·able·themselves

21 not is to·¬rejoice to·the⁺ ⁼¬ungodly⁺ told lord ⁼the ⁼God

58 ꜝ¬cry·out in to·¬strength and ńot you·should·¬spare·yourself as °trumpet ꜝ¬lift·up °the ⁼voice of·you and ꜝ¬announce to·the ⁼people of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬sins⁺ of·them and to·the ⁼house of·Ya‘aqob °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them

2 °me* °day out of·day they·¬seek and to·know of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ they·¬long·for as people °justice having·done and °judgment of·God of·him ńot having·¬left·behind they·¬ask °me now °judgment ⁼just and to·¬come·near to·God they·¬long·for

3 saying °what ¬that we·fasted and not you·¬saw we·¬humbled °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·us and not you·knew in for to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼fastings⁺ of·you⁺ you⁺·find °the⁺ ⁼¬wills⁺ of·you⁺ and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬under·one's·hand⁺ of·you⁺ you⁺·¬goad

4 if to °judgments⁺ and °¬quarrels⁺ you⁺·fast and you⁺·¬strike to·¬fists⁺ °¬lowly so·that °what to·me you⁺·fast as today to·be·heard in to·¬shouting °the ⁼voice of·you⁺

5 not °this ⁼the ⁼fasting I·¬selected·myself and °day to·¬humble °human °the ⁼soul of·him not·then iᵮ you·should·¬bend as °¬hook ⁼the ⁼neck of·you and °¬sackcloth and °¬ashes should·¬spread not·then thus you⁺·will·call °fasting ⁼¬acceptable

6 ¬not! °¬such·as·this ⁼fasting I* I·¬selected·myself says lord but ꜝ¬loose °all ⁼¬bond of·¬unrighteousness ꜝ¬disperse °¬perverseness of·¬strong⁺ ⁼¬exchanges⁺ ꜝmission·off °having·been·¬crushed in to·¬forgiveness and °all ⁼¬writ ⁼¬unjust ꜝ¬tear·apart

7 ꜝ¬break·through to·hungering °the ⁼bread of·you and °¬poors⁺ ⁼¬homeless⁺ ꜝ¬bring·in to °the ⁼house of·you ifᵮ you·should·¬see °naked ꜝ¬clothe and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬of·one's·household⁺ of·the ⁼seed of·you not ¬???

8 ŧhen will·be·¬thrown·violently °¬early·rain °the ⁼light of·you and °the⁺ ⁼¬healings⁺ of·you ¬quickly will·¬rise and will·¬go·before·himself ¬before of·you the ⁼justice of·you and the ⁼¬glory of·the ⁼God will·¬screen °you

9 ŧhen you·will·¬cry·out·yourself and the ⁼God will·¬listen·to·himself of·you ¬still of·speaking of·you will·¬say ¬¡see! I·¬am·present ifᵮ you·should·¬remove off of·you °¬bond and °¬stretching·forth·hands and °¬declaration of·¬murmuring

10 and you·should·give to·hungering °the ⁼bread out of·soul of·you and °soul ⁼having·self-¬humbled you·should·¬fill·up ŧhen will·¬rise in to·the ⁼¬darkness °the ⁼light of·you and the ⁼¬darkness of·you as ¬noon

11 and will·be·himself the ⁼God of·you with of·you through of·all and you·will·be·¬filled·up ¬just·as ¬longs·for the ⁼soul of·you and the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·you will·be·¬fattened and you·will·be·yourself as ¬garden ⁼¬getting·drunk and as ¬flow °which ńot ¬failed water and the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·you as ¬crop will·¬rise and will·be·¬fattened and they·will·¬inherit °generations⁺ of·generations⁺

12 and they·will·be·¬built of·you the⁺ ⁼¬deserteds⁺ eternal⁺ and will·be·himself of·you the⁺ ⁼¬foundations⁺ ⁼eternal⁺ of·generations⁺ to·generations⁺ and you·will·be·called ¬builder of·¬fences⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬paths⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬each °¬midst you·will·¬cease

13 ifᵮ you·should·¬turn·away °the ⁼foot of·you off of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ of·the·one ńot to·do °the⁺ ⁼¬wills⁺ of·you in to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼holy and you·will·call °the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ ⁼¬delicate⁺ ⁼holy⁺ to·the ⁼God of·you not you·will·¬take·up °the ⁼foot of·you upon to·work not·then you·will·speak °saying in to·¬wrath out of·the ⁼mouth of·you

14 and you·will·be·yourself having·¬persuaded upon °lord and will·¬pull·up °you upon °the⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·the ⁼earth and will·¬feed °you °the ⁼¬inheritance of·Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼father of·you the·one for mouth of·lord spoke °these⁺

59 ńot not ¬is·strong the ⁼hand of·lord of·the·one to·¬save or ¬weighed·down °the ⁼ear of·him of·the·one ńot to·¬listen·to

2 but the⁺ ⁼¬sins⁺ of·you⁺ they·should·¬pass ¬each °¬midst of·you⁺ and of·the ⁼God and through °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you⁺ ¬turned·away °the ⁼¬face of·him off of·you⁺ of·the·one ńot to·¬have·mercy

3 the·ones⁺ for hands⁺ of·you⁺ having·been·¬defiled to·blood and the⁺ ⁼fingers⁺ of·you⁺ in to·sins⁺ then the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·you⁺ spoke °¬lawlessness and the ⁼tongue of·you⁺ °¬unrighteousness ¬meditates

4 no·one speaks °just⁺ not·then is judgment ⁼¬true they·have·¬persuaded upon to·¬futile⁺ and they·speak °¬empty⁺ ¬that ¬??? °¬travail and they·¬give·birth·to °¬lawlessness

5 °¬eggs⁺ of·asps⁺ they·¬threw·violently and °¬mast of·¬of·a·spider ¬??? and the ⁼¬ensuing of·the⁺ ⁼¬eggs⁺ of·them to·¬eat ¬breaking °¬rotten·egg found and in to·him ¬???

6 the ⁼¬mast of·them not will·be·himself to °cloak not·then ńot they·should·¬clothe·themselves off of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·them the·ones⁺ for works⁺ of·them works⁺ of·¬lawlessness

7 then the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·them upon °¬evil they·¬run ¬quick⁺ to·¬pour·out °blood and the⁺ ⁼¬reasonings⁺ of·them ¬reasonings⁺ of·¬foolish⁺ ¬ruin and ¬misery in to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them

8 and °¬road of·peace not they·have·¬seen and not is judgment in to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them the·ones⁺ for ¬paths⁺ of·them having·self-¬perverted °which⁺ they·¬go·through and not they·have·¬seen °peace

9 through °this ¬left the ⁼judgment off of·them and not ńot should·¬grasp °them justice of·¬remaining of·them °light was·generated·himself to·them °¬darkness ¬staying °¬daybreak in to·¬midnight they·¬walked

10 they·will·¬touch as ¬blind⁺ °wall and as not of·¬possessioning ⁼¬eyes⁺ they·will·¬touch and they·will·¬collapse·themselves in to·¬noon as in to·¬midnight as dying·off they·will·¬groan

11 as bear and as dove ¬together they·will·¬travel·themselves we·¬awaited °judgment and not is ¬salvation ¬far has·¬left off of·us

12 much for of·us the ⁼¬lawlessness ¬in·front·of of·you and the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us they·¬opposed to·us the·ones⁺ for ¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·us in to·us and °the⁺ ⁼¬crimes⁺ of·us we·knew

13 we·¬were·ungodly and we·lay·ourselves and we·¬left off ¬after of·the ⁼God of·us we·spoke °¬unjust⁺ and we·¬disobeyed we·¬sired and we·¬meditated off of·heart of·us °sayings⁺ ⁼¬unjust⁺

14 and we·¬left ¬after °the ⁼judgment and the ⁼justice ¬far has·¬left ¬that was·¬consumed in to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them the ⁼¬truth and through of·¬straight not they·were·able·themselves to·¬pass·through

15 and the ⁼¬truth has·been·¬taken·up and they·¬moved °the ⁼¬mind of·the·one to·¬understand and ¬saw lord and not ¬pleased to·him ¬that not was judgment

16 and ¬saw and not was man and ¬observed and not was the ⁼going·to·self-¬help and ¬defended·himself °them to·the ⁼arm of·him and to·the ⁼¬charity ¬established·himself

17 and ¬put·on·himself °justice as °¬breastplates⁺ and ¬put·on·himself °¬helmet of·¬saving upon of·the ⁼head and ¬clothed·himself °cloak of·¬vengeance and °the ⁼¬covering

18 as going·to·¬repay °¬reward °¬disgrace to·the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺

19 and they·will·be·¬feared the·ones⁺ off of·wests⁺ °the ⁼name of·lord and the·ones⁺ off of·¬easts⁺ of·sun °the ⁼name ⁼the·one °¬honored will·¬come for as ¬river ⁼¬strong the ⁼¬wrath ¬from of·lord will·¬come with of·¬wrath

20 and will·¬come ¬because·of of·¬Zion the ⁼self-¬rescuing and will·¬turn·away of·¬ungodlinessness off of·Ya‘aqob

21 and this to·them the·one ¬from myˊ ¬covenant told lord the ⁼breath ⁼the·one myˊ which is upon to·you and the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ °which⁺ I·gave to °the ⁼mouth of·you not ńot should·¬fail out of·the ⁼mouth of·you and out of·the ⁼mouth ⁼the ⁼seed of·you told for lord off of·the·one now and to °the ⁼eternity

60 ꜝlight·yourself ꜝlight·yourself Yerushalam ¬comes for of·you the ⁼light and the ⁼¬glory of·lord upon °you has·¬rised

2 ¬¡see! °¬darkness and ¬darkness will·¬cover °earth upon °nations⁺ upon then °you will·be·¬shined lord and the ⁼¬glory of·him upon °you will·be·¬seen

3 and they·will·¬travel·themselves kings⁺ to·the ⁼light of·you and nations⁺ to·the ⁼¬brightness of·you

4 ꜝ¬take·up ¬surrounding °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you and ꜝ¬see °having·self-¬assembled ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you ¬¡see! they·¬come all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you ¬from·afar and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you upon of·shoulders⁺ they·will·be·¬taken·up

5 ŧhen you·will·¬see·yourself and you·will·be·¬feared and you·will·be·¬amazed to·the ⁼heart ¬that will·¬change·mind to °you riches of·sea and of·nations⁺ and of·peoples⁺ and they·will·¬come to·you

6 ¬herds⁺ of·camels⁺ and they·will·¬cover °you camels⁺ of·¬Midian and Gaifa all⁺ out Saba they·will·¬come ¬bearing °gold and °¬frankincense they·will·¬bear and °the ⁼¬saving of·lord they·will·¬announce·themselves

7 and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ Kēdar they·will·be·¬assembled to·you and ¬rams⁺ Nabaiōth they·will·¬come to·you and will·be·¬carried·up °¬acceptable⁺ upon °the ⁼¬altar of·me and the ⁼house of·the ⁼¬prayer of·me will·be·¬glorified

8 what⁺ ⁼¬these⁺ as clouds⁺ they·wing·themselves and as doves⁺ wiŧh to·¬nestlings⁺

9 °me* ¬islands⁺ they·¬remained and °sailboats⁺ Tharsis in to·first⁺ to·¬bring °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you ¬from·afar and °the ⁼silver and °the ⁼gold with of·them through °the ⁼name of·lord °the ⁼holy and through °the·one °the ⁼holy of·the ⁼Yisra’el °¬honored to·be

10 and they·will·¬build ¬foreign⁺ °the⁺ ⁼walls⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·them they·will·¬stand·by·themselves to·you through for °¬wrath of·me I·¬struck °you and through °mercy I·loved °you

11 and they·will·be·¬opened the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·you through of·all of·day and of·night not they·will·be·¬shut to·¬bring·in unto °you °ability of·nations⁺ and °kings⁺ ⁼self-¬bringing

12 the·ones⁺ for nations⁺ and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ ⁼whos⁺ not they·will·serve to·you they·will·¬destroy·themselves and the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ to·¬desert they·will·be·¬layed·waste

22 the ⁼¬very·few will·be·himself to °thousands⁺ and the ⁼¬least to °nation ⁼great I* lord ¬according·to °¬time I·will·¬assemble °them

10 and to·¬joy they·will·be·¬celebrated upon °lord ꜝlet·¬rejoice·himself the ⁼soul of·me upon to·the ⁼lord ¬put·on for °me °cloak of·¬saving and °tunic of·¬joy as to·bridegroom ¬put·on to·me °¬mitre and as °bride ¬adorned °me to·cosmos

11 and as °earth ⁼¬growing the ⁼¬flower of·her and as ¬garden °the⁺ ⁼seeds⁺ of·him thus will·¬rise lord °justice and ¬leap·for·joy ¬in·front·of of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

62 through of·¬Zion not I·will·¬be·quiet·myself and through of·Yerushalam not I·will·¬loosen ¬until iᵮ should·come·out as °light the ⁼justice of·me then the ⁼¬saving of·me as ¬window will·be·¬kindled

2 and they·will·¬see·themselves nations⁺ °the ⁼justice of·you and kings⁺ °the ⁼¬glory of·you and will·call °you °the ⁼name of·you °the ⁼¬new ⁼which the ⁼lord will·name °it

2 through °what of·you °¬Red·Sea⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬clothings⁺ of·you as off of·¬trampled of·¬winepress

4 day for of·¬reward ¬arrived to·them and ¬year of·¬redemption ¬is·present

5 and I·¬looked·upon and no·one ⁼¬helper and I·¬payed·attention·to and no·one ¬helped·himself and ¬rescued·himself °them the ⁼arm of·me and the ⁼¬wrath of·me ¬approached

19 we·were·generated·ourselves as °the·one off of·¬beginning when not you·¬were·first of·us not·then was·¬called the ⁼name of·you upon °us ifᵮ you·should·¬open °the ⁼heaven ¬trembling will·take·himself off of·you °mountains⁺ and they·will·¬melt·themselves

64 as ¬beeswax off fire ¬melts·himself and will·¬burn fire °the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺ and ¬clear will·be·himself the ⁼name of·lord in to·the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺ off of·¬face of·you °nations⁺ they·will·be·¬troubled

2 ¬when you·should·do °the⁺ ⁼¬honored⁺ ¬trembling will·take·himself off of·you °mountains⁺

4 will·¬meet·himself for to·the·ones⁺ they·do °the ⁼just and of·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you they·will·be·¬remembered ¬¡see! you you·were·¬angered and we we·sinned through °this we·were·¬led·astray

5 and we·were·been·generated as ¬unclean⁺ ⁼all⁺ we as ¬cloth of·self-¬sitting·apart all ⁼the ⁼justice of·us and we·¬flowed·away as °¬leafs⁺ through °the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·us thus ¬wind will·¬bear °us

6 and not is the ⁼self-¬calling °the ⁼name of·you and the ⁼¬remembered to·self-¬help of·you ¬that you·¬turned·away °the ⁼¬face of·you off of·us and you·¬delivered °us through °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us

2 I·¬extended °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me °¬all ⁼the ⁼day unto °people ⁼¬disobeying and °¬disputing which⁺ not they·were·¬travelled to·¬road ⁼¬true but ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them

9 and I·will·¬lead·out °the·one out of·Ya‘aqob °seed and °the·one out of·Yudah and will·¬inherit °the ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼holy of·me and they·will·¬inherit the⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ of·me and the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·me and they·will·¬dwell there

10 and they·will·be·themselves in to·the ⁼¬grove ¬residences⁺ of·¬flocks⁺ and ¬valley Achōr to °¬rest of·¬herds⁺ to·the ⁼people of·me which⁺ they·¬sought °me

11 you⁺ then the⁺ ⁼¬leaving·behind °me and self-¬forgetting °the ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼holy of·me and ¬making·ready to·the ⁼¬demon °¬table and ¬fulfilling to·the ⁼¬good·luck °¬mixture

12 I* I·will·¬deliver °you⁺ to °¬sword all⁺ in to·¬slaughter you⁺·will·¬collapse·yourselves⁺ ¬that I·called °you⁺ and not you⁺·¬obeyed I·spoke and you⁺·¬ignored and you⁺·did °the ⁼¬evil ¬in·front·of myˊ and °which⁺ not I·¬planed·myself you⁺·¬selected·yourselves⁺

13 through this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼serving to·me they·will·¬eat·themselves you⁺ then you⁺·will·hunger ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼serving to·me they·will·drink·themselves you⁺ then you⁺·will·thirst ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼serving to·me they·will·be·¬celebrated you⁺ then you⁺·will·be·¬been·ashamed

14 ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼serving to·me they·will·¬rejoice·themselves in to·¬joy you⁺ then you⁺·will·¬cry·yourselves⁺ through °the ⁼¬travail of·the ⁼heart of·you⁺ and off of·¬breaking of·breath you⁺·will·¬wail·yourselves⁺

15 you⁺·will·¬leave·behind for °the ⁼name of·you⁺ to °¬gratification to·the⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ of·me °you⁺ then will·¬kill lord to·the·ones⁺ then they·serve to·him will·be·called °name ⁼¬new

16 which will·be·¬praised upon of·the ⁼earth they·will·¬praise for °the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬true and the⁺ ⁼¬swearing upon of·the ⁼earth they·will·¬swear·themselves °the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬true they·will·¬forget·themselves for °the ⁼¬pressure of·them °the ⁼first and not will·¬ascend·himself of·them upon °the ⁼heart

17 will·be·himself for the ⁼heaven ⁼¬new and the ⁼earth ⁼¬new and not ńot they·should·be·¬remembered of·the⁺ ⁼¬before⁺ not·then not ńot should·¬arrive of·them upon °the ⁼heart

18 but °¬joy and °¬leap·for·joy they·will·find in to·her ¬that ¬¡see! I* I·do °Yerushalam °¬leap·for·joy and °the ⁼people of·me °¬joy

19 and I·will·¬rejoice·myself upon °Yerushalam and I·will·be·¬celebrated upon to·the ⁼people of·me and ¬not·any·more ńot should·be·heard in to·her voice of·¬weeping not·then voice of·¬shouting

20 and not ńot should·be·generated·himself there ¬unseasonable and ¬old·man ⁼which not will·¬fill·up °the ⁼¬time of·him will·be·himself for the ⁼young hundred of·years⁺ then the ⁼dying·off ⁼¬sinful hundred of·years⁺ and ¬cursed will·be·himself

21 and they·will·¬build °houses⁺ and they they·will·¬dwell·in and they·will·¬plant °vineyards⁺ and they they·will·¬eat·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬offsprings⁺ of·them

22 and not ńot they·will·¬build and others⁺ they·will·¬dwell·in and not ńot they·will·¬plant and others⁺ they·will·¬eat·themselves ¬according·to for °the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬wood of·the ⁼life they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼people of·me °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬travails⁺ of·them they·will·¬get·old

23 then the⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ of·me not they·will·¬labor to °¬empty not·then they·will·¬produce·children to °¬curse ¬that seed ⁼having·been·¬praised ¬by of·God is and the⁺ ⁼¬descendant⁺ of·them with of·them they·will·be·themselves

24 and will·be·himself ¬before to·¬cry °them I* I·will·¬listen·to·myself of·them ¬still of·speaking of·them I·will·¬say what is

25 ŧhen wolves⁺ and lambs⁺ they·will·be·¬feeded ¬together and lion as ¬ox will·¬eat·himself °¬chaffs⁺ ¬snake then °earth as °bread not they·will·¬harm not·then ńot they·will·¬ravage·themselves upon to·the ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼holy of·me says lord

66 thus says lord ⁼the ⁼heaven to·me throne then the ⁼earth ¬footstool of·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·me °¬what? ⁼house you⁺·will·¬build to·me or ¬what? ⁼¬place of·the ⁼¬rest of·me

2 °all⁺ for °these⁺ did the ⁼hand of·me and is my all⁺ ⁼these⁺ says lord and upon °what I·will·¬look·upon but or upon °the ⁼¬lowly and °¬quiet and °¬trembling °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me

3 then the ⁼¬lawless ⁼the ⁼¬sacrificing to·me °calf as the ⁼killing·off °dog then the ⁼¬carrying·up °¬fine·flour as °blood ⁼¬like·a·pig the ⁼giving °¬frankincense to °¬memorial as ¬blasphemous and these⁺ they·¬selected·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·them °which⁺ the ⁼soul of·them ¬willed

4 and I* I·will·¬select·myself °the⁺ ⁼¬mockeries⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ I·will·¬repay to·them ¬that I·called °them and not they·¬obeyed of·me I·spoke and not they·heard and they·did °the ⁼¬evil ¬in·front·of of·me and °which⁺ not I·¬planed·myself they·¬selected·themselves

5 ꜝhear⁺ °the ⁼¬declaration of·lord the⁺ ⁼¬trembling °the ⁼saying of·him ꜝtell⁺ brothers⁺ of·us to·the·ones⁺ they·¬hate °us and to·self-¬abhorring so·that the ⁼name of·lord should·be·¬glorified and should·be·¬seen in to·the ⁼¬joy of·them and those⁺ they·will·be·¬been·ashamed

9 I* then I·gave °the ⁼¬expectation ⁼this and not you·were·¬remembered of·me told lord not ¬¡see! I* °engendering and °¬barren I·did told the ⁼God

10 ꜝbe·¬celebrated Yerushalam and ꜝ¬assemble·for·a·festival⁺ in to·her all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼loving °her ꜝbe·¬rejoiced⁺ to·¬joy all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ you⁺·¬mourn upon of·her

11 so·that you⁺·should·suckle and you⁺·should·be·¬filled·up off of·¬breast of·¬encouragement of·her so·that ¬sucking·out you⁺·should·¬self-indulge off of·¬entry ⁼¬glory of·her

12 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬turn·from to °them as ¬river of·peace and as ¬brook ⁼¬inundating °¬glory of·nations⁺ the·one ¬disciplines⁺ of·them upon of·shoulders⁺ they·will·be·¬taken·up and upon of·knees⁺ they·will·be·¬pleaded

13 as if °whatever mother will·¬plead thus and I* I·will·¬plead °you⁺ and in to·Yerushalam you⁺·will·be·¬pleaded

14 and you⁺·will·¬see·yourselves⁺ and will·be·¬rejoiced of·you⁺ the ⁼heart and the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·you⁺ as ¬crop will·¬rise and will·be·known the ⁼hand of·lord to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬·devout °him and will·¬threaten to·the·ones⁺ they·¬disobey

15 ¬¡see! for lord as fire will·¬come and as ¬blast °the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·him to·¬pay in to·¬wrath °¬vengeance and °¬dismissal in to·¬flame of·fire

16 in for to·the ⁼fire of·lord will·be·judged all ⁼the ⁼earth and in to·the ⁼sword of·him all ⁼flesh many⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ they·will·be·themselves ¬by of·lord

17 the⁺ ⁼self-¬purifying and self-¬cleaning to °the⁺ ⁼¬gardens⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬thresholds⁺ ¬eating °meat ⁼¬like·a·pig and °the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ and °the·one now upon °the °it they·will·be·¬consumed told lord

18 and I* °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·them and °the ⁼¬thought of·them I·¬know·myself I·come·myself to·¬assemble °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼tongues⁺ and they·will·¬come and they·will·¬see·themselves °the ⁼¬glory of·me

19 and I·will·¬leave·behind upon of·them °signs⁺ and I·will·¬send·out out of·them °having·been·¬saved to °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ to Tharsis and Foud and Loud and Mosoch and Thobel and to °the ⁼¬Greece and to °the⁺ ⁼¬islands⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬far which⁺ not they·have·heard of·me °the ⁼name not·then they·have·¬seen °the ⁼¬glory of·me and they·will·¬announce of·me °the ⁼¬glory in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺

20 and they·will·¬bring °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you⁺ out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ °¬gift to·lord with of·horses⁺ and of·¬chariots⁺ in to·¬covered·royal·chariots⁺ of·¬half-donkeys⁺ with of·¬awnings⁺ to °the ⁼holy ⁼city ⁼Yerushalam told lord as iᵮ may·they·¬bear the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·me* °the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·them with of·psalms⁺ to °the ⁼house of·lord

21 and off of·them I·will·take·myself to·me* priests⁺ and °¬Levites⁺ told lord

22 °which ⁼¬way for the ⁼heaven ⁼¬new and the ⁼earth ⁼¬new which⁺ I* I·do ¬stays ¬before of·me says lord thus will·stand·himself the ⁼seed of·you⁺ and the ⁼name of·you⁺

23 and will·be·himself month out of·month and shabbat out of·shabbat will·¬come all ⁼flesh ¬before of·me to·¬worship in to·Yerushalam told lord

24 and they·will·come·out·themselves and they·will·¬see·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬corpses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬transgressed in to·me* the·one for ¬worm of·them not will·¬decease and the ⁼fire of·them not will·be·¬extinguished and they·will·be·themselves to °¬appearance to·all ⁼flesh
